int bcm_port_priority_config_set (int unit, bcm_port_t port, bcm_port_prio_config_t *port_priority_config)
 Configure priority groups for the port. Priority group is meant to connect one or more user priorities (see BCM_PORT_F_PRIORITY_*) to a scheduler priority (High, Low, TDM) Each priority group acts as a logical FIFO. The size of the FIFO can be dynamically specified, in entries. More...

int bcm_port_ilkn_lane_map_set (int unit, int flags, bcm_port_t port, int num_of_lanes, int *lanes)
 This API is used to configure the order of the ILKN lanes. Each index in lanes[] array stands for ILKN lane ID. The values of lanes[] array is the NIF/Fabric lanes mapped to ILKN logical lane. More...

typedef _shr_port_mode_t bcm_port_abil_t

Port ability mask.

The following flags are used to indicate which set of capabilities are provided by a PHY or MAC when retrieving the ability of a port, setting or getting the local advertisement, getting the remote advertisement, or setting the MAC encapsulation and/or CRC modes.

◆ bcm_stat_threshold_t

typedef struct bcm_stat_threshold_s bcm_stat_threshold_t

Statistics threshold information. Interpretations of arg1 and arg2: single: stat > arg1 raises alarm; stat <= arg2 clears alarm range: !(arg1 <= stat <= arg2) raises alarm; inverse clears alarm zero: stat == 0 raises alarm; stat != 0 clears alarm. arg1/2 ignored signed: as range, except arg1/2 are interpreted as signed (int32_t)

◆ bcm_stat_threshold_type_t

◆ bcm_port_control_e

enum bcm_port_control_e

Features that can be controlled on a per-port basis.

Enumerator
bcmPortControlBridge 

Enable local port bridging.

bcmPortControlTrunkHashSet 

Select one of the two sets of hash bits selection configuration for trunking.

bcmPortControlFabricTrunkHashSet 

Select one of the two sets of hash bits selection configuration for fabric trunking.

bcmPortControlECMPHashSet 

Select one of the two sets of hash bits selection configuration for ECMP.

bcmPortControlLoadBalanceHashSet 

Select one of the two sets of hash bits selection configuration for LBID to be populated in HiGig2 header.

bcmPortControlLoadBalancingNumber 

Assigns the Load Balancing Number of this port for HiGig2 headers.

bcmPortControlErrorSymbolDetect 

Enable or disable XAUI |E| monitoring feature for port's XAUI lanes.

bcmPortControlErrorSymbolCount 

Get the number of XAUI |E| symbol occured since last read. Setting any value to the count will set it to zero.

bcmPortControlIP4 

Enable IPv4 Routing on port.

bcmPortControlIP6 

Enable IPv6 Routing on port.

bcmPortControlIP4Mcast 

Enable IPv4 Multicast on port.

bcmPortControlIP6Mcast 

Enable IPv6 Multicast on port.

bcmPortControlIP4McastL2 

Enable L2 switching on IPv4 IPMC packets based on (SG,*G) instead of (DMAC,VLAN).

bcmPortControlIP6McastL2 

Enable L2 switching on IPv6 IPMC packets based on (SG,*G) instead of (DMAC,VLAN).

bcmPortControlMpls 

Enable MPLS on the port ingress.

bcmPortControlPassControlFrames 

Enable controls frames on port.

bcmPortControlFilterLookup 

Enable port lookup Field Processor.

bcmPortControlFilterIngress 

Enable ingress Field Processor on port.

bcmPortControlFilterEgress 

Enable egress Field Processor on port.

bcmPortControlFrameSpacingStretch 

One byte of inter packet gap is added for specified number of packet data bytes. If the value is 10, one byte of IPG is added for each 10 byte of packet data.

bcmPortControlPreservePacketPriority 

Preserve packet original IEEE 802.1p priority.

bcmPortControlLearnClassEnable 

Enable class based station movement checks.

bcmPortControlTrustIncomingVlan 

Trust incoming packet's Vlan tag

bcmPortControlDoNotCheckVlan 

Enable/disable spanning tree and Vlan membership checks on ingress Ethernet and higig packets. For CPU port configuration is applied only for higig packets. To configure these settings for Ethernet packets bcmPortControlDoNotCheckVlanFromCpu port control can be used.

bcmPortControlDoNotCheckVlanFromCpu 

Enable/disable spanning tree and Vlan membership checks on Ethernet packets that are ingressed from CPU port.

bcmPortControlIEEE8021ASEnableIngress 

Enable/disable ingress processing of IEEE 802.1AS protocol packets.

bcmPortControlIEEE8021ASEnableEgress 

Enable/disable egress processing of IEEE 802.1AS protocol packets.

bcmPortControlPrbsMode 

PRBS location - 0=>Phy PRBS 1=>MAC/SI Port

bcmPortControlPrbsPolynomial 

Assigns PRBS polynomial, BCM_PORT_PRBS_POLYNOMIAL_

bcmPortControlPrbsTxInvertData 

Configure inversion of Tx data

bcmPortControlPrbsForceTxError 

Configure insertion of Tx errors

bcmPortControlPrbsTxEnable 

Enable Tx PRBS

bcmPortControlPrbsRxEnable 

Enable Rx PRBS

bcmPortControlPrbsRxStatus 

PRBS Rx status

bcmPortControlSerdesDriverStrength 

Assigns Driver Strength

bcmPortControlSerdesDriverEqualization 

Assigns Driver Equalization

bcmPortControlSerdesDriverEqualizationFarEnd 

Informs software of far end transmit driver equalization setting for tuning

bcmPortControlSerdesDriverTune 

Start hardware receive equalization tuning

bcmPortControlSerdesDriverEqualizationTuneStatusFarEnd 

Get results of tune operation which include suggested far end equalization update

bcmPortControlAbility 

Assigns Port ability, BCM_PORT_ABILITY_

bcmPortControlMacInMac 

Enable/Disable MiM frame processing

bcmPortControlSrcBmacMissToCpu 

Mac-in-Mac Source BMAC lookup miss, Send to CPU (value = TRUE/FALSE)

bcmPortControlOamLoopback 

Enable/Disable 802.3 Clause 57 Oam Loopback

bcmPortControlEgressVlanPriUsesPktPri 

If set, outgoing packets derive their priority from the incoming priority

bcmPortControlPacketFlowMode 

Enable/Disable requeue for hybrid mode

bcmPortControlTrain 

Start/stop training sequence

bcmPortControlRxEnable 

Rx enable/disable

bcmPortControlTxEnable 

Tx enable/disable

bcmPortControlRxLink 

Retreives Rx Status

bcmPortControlTxLink 

Retreives Tx Status

bcmPortControlIpfixRate 

Set IPFIX flow rate meter id

bcmPortControlOAMEnable 

Enable reception of OAM messages

bcmPortControlCustomerQueuing 

Enable customer domain queuing

bcmPortControlFabricKnockoutId 

sets port identifier, used for source knockout functionality

bcmPortControlLanes 

Sets the number of active lanes for a port that can be dynamically hot-swapped.

bcmPortControlEgressNonUnicastLossless 

Enable/Disable multicast Lossless operation

bcmPortControlPFCEthertype 

Priority Flow Control packet EtherType

bcmPortControlPFCOpcode 

Priority Flow Control packet opcode

bcmPortControlPFCReceive 

Priority Flow Control packet receive enable

bcmPortControlPFCTransmit 

Priority Flow Control packet transmit enable

bcmPortControlPFCClasses 

Priority Flow Control number of classes

bcmPortControlPFCPassFrames 

Allow Priority Flow Control packets into switch device

bcmPortControlPFCDestMacOui 

Priority Flow Control packet destination MAC address, upper three bytes

bcmPortControlPFCDestMacNonOui 

Priority Flow Control packet destination MAC address, lower three bytes

bcmPortControlPFCRefreshTime 

Priority Flow Control refresh time

bcmPortControlVrf 

Enable per-port VRF to override per-Vlan VRF

bcmPortControlL3Ingress 

Enable per-port L3-IIF for IP traffic

bcmPortControlL2Learn 

Configure L2 learning behavior using BCM_PORT_LEARN_xxx flags

bcmPortControlL2Move 

Configure L2 station movement behavior using BCM_PORT_LEARN_xxx flags

bcmPortControlForwardStaticL2MovePkt 

Allow forwarding L2 packet even if L2 movement is detected against an existing static entry in L2 table

bcmPortControlLinkFaultLocalEnable 

Enable local LSS message processing

bcmPortControlLinkFaultRemoteEnable 

Enable remote LSS message processing

bcmPortControlLinkFaultLocal 

Read local LSS message processing status

bcmPortControlLinkFaultRemote 

Read remote LSS message processing status

bcmPortControlTimestampTransmit 

Read the timestamp value assigned to TX packet

bcmPortControlTimestampEnable 

Set the port to be capable of timestamping TX packet

bcmPortControlTCPriority 

Indicates the default Traffic Class attributes assoiated with the port

bcmPortControlDropPrecedence 

Indicates the default Drop Precedence attributes assoiated with the port

bcmPortControlFabricQueue 

Enable ext header on HiGig port.

bcmPortControlLinkdownTransmit 

Enable transmission when linkdown

bcmPortControlEEETransmitWakeTime 

Time(in microsecs) to wait before transmitter can begin transmitting leaving Low Power Idle State

bcmPortControlEEEReceiveWakeTime 

Time(in microsecs) Receiver counts for SLEEP or IDLE symbols to move to Active from Low Power Idle State

bcmPortControlEEETransmitSleepTime 

Time(in microsecs) Tranmitter sends SLEEP symbols before going to QUIET state

bcmPortControlEEEReceiveSleepTime 

Time(in microsecs) Receiver is in SLEEP state before entering QUIET state

bcmPortControlEEETransmitQuietTime 

Time(in microsecs) transmit stays in Quiet state before entering REFRESH state

bcmPortControlEEEReceiveQuietTime 

Time(in microsecs) Receiver stays in Quiet state before it expects REFRESH signal

bcmPortControlEEETransmitRefreshTime 

Time(in microsecs) transmitter stays in Refresh state

bcmPortControlSerdesTuneMarginMax 

SerDes max tune margin value

bcmPortControlSerdesTuneMarginMode 

SerDes in tune margin mode

bcmPortControlSerdesTuneMarginValue 

Value used to measure tune margin

bcmPortControlStatOversize 

Threshold above which packet will be counted as oversized

bcmPortControlStatOversizeIsError 

Oversize Threshold flag to control oversize packets as error counts

bcmPortControlEEEEnable 

Enable/Disable Energy Efficient Ethernet

bcmPortControlEEEStatisticsClear 

Clear Energy Efficient Ethernet Low Power Idle Statistics

bcmPortControlEEETransmitIdleTime 

Time (in microsecs) for which condition to move to LPI state is satisfied, at the end of which MAC transitions to LPI state

bcmPortControlEEETransmitEventCount 

Number of time MAC TX enters LPI state for a given measurement interval

bcmPortControlEEETransmitDuration 

Time (in microseconds) for which MAC TX is in LPI state during a measurement interval

bcmPortControlEEEReceiveEventCount 

Number of time MAC RX enters LPI state for a given measurement interval

bcmPortControlEEEReceiveDuration 

Time (in microseconds) for which MAC RX is in LPI state during a measurement interval

bcmPortControlEEETransmitIdleTimeHund 

The same as PortControlEEETransmitIdleTime for the link speed at 100MB data rate

bcmPortControlEEETransmitWakeTimeHund 

The same as PortControlEEETransmitWakeTime for the link speed at 100MB data rate

bcmPortControlEEETransmitMinLPITime 

Time (in microseconds) MAC stay in LPI state before leaving it

bcmPortControlEEETransmitMinLPITimeHund 

The same as PortControlEEETransmitMinLPITime for the link speed at 100MB data rate

bcmPortControlNivAccessVirtualInterfaceId 

Source virtual interface identifier (value range 0-0xfff)

bcmPortControlNivNonVntagDrop 

Set Ingress drop control, if VNTAG is not present (value = TRUE/FALSE)

bcmPortControlNivVntagDrop 

Set Ingress drop control, if VNTAG is present (value = TRUE/FALSE)

bcmPortControlNivNonVntagAdd 

Set ADD tag action, when VNTAG is not present(value = TRUE/FALSE)

bcmPortControlNivVntagIngressReplace 

Set REPLACE Ingress tag action, when VNTAG is present (value = TRUE/FALSE)

bcmPortControlNivVntagEgressReplace 

Set REPLACE Egress tag action, when VNTAG is present (value = TRUE/FALSE)

bcmPortControlNivVntagIngressDelete 

Set DELETE Ingress tag action, when VNTAG is present (value = TRUE/FALSE)

bcmPortControlNivVntagEgressDelete 

Set DELETE Egress tag action, when VNTAG is present (value = TRUE/FALSE)

bcmPortControlNivRpfCheck 

Set incoming packet VNTAG.SRC_VIF RPF check control (value = TRUE/FALSE)

bcmPortControlNivSourceKnockout 

Set outgoing packet NIV pruning check control (value = TRUE/FALSE)

bcmPortControlNivForwardPort 

Set destination port for forwarding - mainly for upstream traffic only, but use -1 as special to flag the port as uplink port (value = local port number or -1)

bcmPortControlNivType 

Set NIV port type (enumerated value within bcm_port_niv_type_t)

bcmPortControlNivNameSpace 

Set namespace value (value range 0-0xfff)

bcmPortControlRemoteCpuEnable 

Enables the port to accept packets from Remote CPU

bcmPortControlRemoteCpuTcMapping 

Enable/Disable the mapping between TC and COS queue for received ToCPU packets

bcmPortControlArbiterActive 

Indicates if the SCI link is active and its arbiter association. -1 indicates disabled, 0 indicates active and associted with Arbiter 0, 1 indicates active and associated with Arbiter 1

bcmPortControlArbiterForceDown 

Status to be indicated to arbiter. TRUE forces Down, FALSE does not force down

bcmPortControlTrill 

Enable/Disable TRILL frame processing (value = TRUE/FALSE)

bcmPortControlTrillAllow 

Allow TRILL frames (value = TRUE/FALSE)

bcmPortControlNonTrillAllow 

Allow Non-TRILL frames (value = TRUE/FALSE)

bcmPortControlTrillCoreISISToCPU 

Core IS-IS frames received, Send to CPU (value = TRUE/FALSE)

bcmPortControlTrillHashSelect 

Select one of 2 sets of configuration for TRILL ECMP hashing (value = 1/0 )

bcmPortControlFabricHeaderFormat 

Select appropriate fabric header type.

bcmPortControlFabricSourceKnockout 

Disables packet forwarding to non-trunk port on local modid

bcmPortControlFaultResponseLocalDataAndIdle 

If Local Fault indicated, continue sending data, send Idles

bcmPortControlFaultResponseLocalDataAndRf 

If Local Fault indicated, continue sending data, send Remote Fault Indication

bcmPortControlFaultResponseLocalDataAndLf 

If Local Fault indicated, continue sending data, send Local Fault Indication

bcmPortControlFaultResponseLocalNoDataIdle 

If Local Fault indicated, stop sending data, send Idles

bcmPortControlFaultResponseLocalNoDataRf 

If Local Fault indicated, stop sending data, send Remote Fault Indication

bcmPortControlFaultResponseLocalNoDataLf 

If Local Fault indicated, stop sending data, send Local Fault Indication

bcmPortControlFaultResponseRemoteDataAndIdle 

If Remote Fault indicated, continue sending data, send Idles

bcmPortControlFaultResponseRemoteDataAndRf 

If Remote Fault indicated, continue sending data, send Remote Fault Indication

bcmPortControlFaultResponseRemoteDataAndLf 

If Remote Fault indicated, continue sending data, send Remote Fault Indication

bcmPortControlFaultResponseRemoteNoDataIdle 

If Remote Fault indicated, stop sending data, send Idles

bcmPortControlFaultResponseRemoteNoDataRf 

If Remote Fault indicated, stop sending data, send Remote Fault Indication

bcmPortControlFaultResponseRemoteNoDataLf 

If Remote Fault indicated, stop sending data, send Remote Fault Indication

bcmPortControlPCS 

The Physical Coding Sub-layer of the port

bcmPortControlLinkDownPowerOn 

0: The Link is disabled on the MAC level, the SerDes power-state is not changed 1: Activate the link on the MAC level, the SerDes power-state is not changed

bcmPortControlRegex 

Enable/Disable tracking of IPv4 flows

bcmPortControlRegexTcp 

Enable/Disable tracking of IPv6 flows

bcmPortControlRegexUdp 

Enable/Disable tracking of IPv4 UDP flows

bcmPortControlPonEncryptKeyExpiryTime 

Set timeout value for encryption keys (s)

bcmPortControlPonHoldoverState 

Enable holdover state

bcmPortControlPonHoldoverTime 

Set holdover time (ms)

bcmPortControlPonMultiLlid 

Set LLID number

bcmPortControlPonFecMode 

Set FEC mode on Rx and Tx together, Rx/Tx off (value = 0), Rx on and Tx off (value = 1), Rx off and Tx on (value = 2), Rx/Tx on (value = 3) or FEC is settable per link (value = 4)

bcmPortControlPonUserTraffic 

Enable user traffic

bcmPortControlEthPortAutoNegFailureAlarmState 

Alarm on/off state of the EthPortAutoNegFailure

bcmPortControlEthPortLosAlarmState 

Alarm on/off state of the EthPortLos

bcmPortControlEthPortFailureAlarmState 

Alarm on/off state of the EthPortFailure

bcmPortControlEthPortLoopbackAlarmState 

Alarm on/off state of the EthPortLoopback

bcmPortControlEthPortCongestionAlarmState 

Alarm on/off state of the EthPortCongestion

bcmPortControlMplsEntropyHashSet 

Select one of 2 sets of configuration for MPLS Entropy hashing (value = 1/0)

bcmPortControlStripCRC 

If set no cell CRC is calculated, else 8-bit CRC will be added to each data cell. Relevant for VSC256 mode only.

bcmPortControlPrivateVlanIsolate 

Argument = 1/0. Enable, disable system port being port isolate type. By default port will be community.

bcmPortControlPrivateVlanModeSet 

Argument = 2/1/0. Set system port private vlan mode (0 : community, 1 : isolate, 2 : promiscuous). By default it is community.

bcmPortControlFloodUnknownUcastGroup 

Override the per-vsi settings.

bcmPortControlFloodUnknownMcastGroup 

Override the per-vsi settings.

bcmPortControlFloodBroadcastGroup 

Override the per-vsi settings.

bcmPortControlDefaultQueue 

Specify default queue ID for use with the port

bcmPortControlL2GreEnable 

Set per port enable for L2-GRE (Value=TRUE/FALSE)

bcmPortControlL2GreTunnelbasedVpnId 

Set per port VPNID lookup key (Value=TRUE/FALSE)

bcmPortControlL2GreDefaultTunnelEnable 

Set per port dafult-SVP for Tunnel lookup failure(Value=TRUE/FALSE)

bcmPortControlL2SaAuthenticaion 

to enable SA authentication check on a port

bcmPortControlUnknownMacDaAction 

Per port configures set of actions that are taken by the device when an unknown destination address is recognized on an ingressing packet

bcmPortControlDiscardMacSaAction 

Per port configures set of actions that are taken by the device upon SA lookup when L2 entry flag with SA-discard

bcmPortControlManagementPacketIp6Reserved 

Classify Packets with IPV6 multicast reserved address FF0X:0:0:0:0:0:0:0 on a port as management frames

bcmPortControlManagementPacketIp4Reserved 

Classify Packets with IPV4 multicast reserved address 224.0.0.x on a port as management frames

bcmPortControlManagementPacketLinkConstrained 

Classify Packets with link-constrained multicast range DMAC=01-80-C2-00-00-0x as management frames

bcmPortControlManagementPacketGarp 

Classify Packets with DA range 0x0180c2000020 through 0x0180c200002f as management frames

bcmPortControlManagementPacketCos 

COS assignment for Management Packets

bcmPortControlManagementPacketColor 

Drop Precedence for Management Packets

bcmPortControlTaggedL3PacketPktPri 

Set packet Priority source for tagged L3 packets (enumerated value within bcm_port_cos_remap_t)

bcmPortControlTaggedMPLSPacketPktPri 

Set packet Priority source for tagged MPLS packets (enumerated value within bcm_port_cos_remap_t)

bcmPortControlTaggedMPLSL3PacketPktPri 

Set packet Priority source for tagged MPLS L3 packets (enumerated value within bcm_port_cos_remap_t)

bcmPortControlEEEEventCountSymmetric 

Operate EEE counter in symmetric mode, where TX and RX counters increment together

bcmPortControlEEELinkActiveDuration 

Time(in microsecs) to wait before EEE transitions to Active state after link status becomes active

bcmPortControlEsmEligibility 

Indicates if ESM search is enabled for packets coming in on this port

bcmPortControlTrillDesignatedVlan 

VLAN which carries Trill packets between RBridges

bcmPortControlMplsFRREnable 

Enable or disable FRR on MPLS packets.

bcmPortControlMplsContextSpecificLabelEnable 

Enable or disable Upstream assignment label on MPLS packets.

bcmPortControlVxlanEnable 

Set per port enable for VXLAN (Value=TRUE/FALSE)

bcmPortControlVxlanTunnelbasedVnId 

Set per port VNID lookup key (Value=TRUE/FALSE)

bcmPortControlVxlanDefaultTunnelEnable 

Set per port dafult-SVP for Tunnel lookup failure(Value=TRUE/FALSE)

bcmPortControlFieldEgressClassSelect 

Select Class Id to pass to EFP

bcmPortControlPonMpcpDiscoveryRate 

EPON Port MPCP Discovery rate in miliseconds.

bcmPortControlPonMpcpDiscoveryGrantLength 

EPON Port MPCP Discovery Grant length in bytes.

bcmPortControlPonMpcpOneRegistrationPerGrant 

Allow only one registration per grant

bcmPortControlPonOamHeartbeatRate 

EPON port OAM heartbeat rate in seconds

bcmPortControlPonMaxLinks 

EPON port maximum number of links

bcmPortControlPonRamanMitigationMode 

EPON port Raman Mitigation mode

bcmPortControlPonLoopTimeMinPropDelay 

EPON Loop Timing Minimum Propagation Delay

bcmPortControlPonLoopTimeMaxPropDelay 

EPON Loop Timing Maximum Propagation Delay

bcmPortControlPonLoopTimeOnuDelay 

EPON Loop Timing Onu Delay

bcmPortControlPonLoopTimeNullGrantSize 

EPON Loop Timing Null Grant size

bcmPortControlPonLoopTimeOltDelay 

EPON Loop Timing OLT delay

bcmPortControlPonSfecAllowedBitErrors 

EPON SFEC Allowed bit errors

bcmPortControlPonTfecAllowedBitErrors 

EPON TFEC Allowed bit errors

bcmPortControlPonFecRxBypass 

Rx FEC Bypass mode

bcmPortControlPonSyncTime 

EPON Sync Time in 16ns(TQ) unit

bcmPortControlPonEncryptionMode 

EPON encryption mode (0 : None, 1 : AE, 2 : CTC, 3 : Zero-overhead AE).

bcmPortControlPonEncryptionDirection 

EPON encryption direction (1 : downstream only, 2 : bi-direction).

bcmPortControlPonOamKeyExchangeMsgBypass 

Bypass processing Key Exchange OAM from Pon port

bcmPortControlTunnelIdIngressSource 

Move outermost VLAN tag to Tunnel ID on ingress

bcmPortControlTunnelIdEgressAdd 

Add outermost VLAN tag as Tunnel ID on egress

bcmPortControlPonOamHeartbeatTimeout 

EPON Oam heartbeat timeout in sec unit

bcmPortControlPonMpcpReportTimeout 

EPON report timeout in ms unit

bcmPortControlPon1GDiscoveryWindow 

Enable 1G discovery window

bcmPortControlPon10GDiscoveryWindow 

Enable 10G discovery window

bcmPortControlExtendedPortVid 

Extended port VID (value range 0-0xfff)

bcmPortControlNonEtagDrop 

Set Ingress drop control, if ETAG is not present (value = TRUE/FALSE)

bcmPortControlEtagDrop 

Set Ingress drop control, if ETAG is present (value = TRUE/FALSE)

bcmPortControlNonEtagAdd 

Set ADD tag action, when ETAG is not present (value = TRUE/FALSE)

bcmPortControlEtagIngressReplace 

Set REPLACE Ingress tag action, when ETAG is present (value = TRUE/FALSE)

bcmPortControlEtagEgressReplace 

Set REPLACE Egress tag action, when ETAG is present (value = TRUE/FALSE)

bcmPortControlEtagIngressDelete 

Set DELETE Ingress tag action, when ETAG is present (value = TRUE/FALSE)

bcmPortControlEtagEgressDelete 

Set DELETE Egress tag action, when ETAG is present (value = TRUE/FALSE)

bcmPortControlExtenderRpfCheck 

Set incoming packet ETAG.SVID RPF check control (value = TRUE/FALSE)

bcmPortControlExtenderSourceKnockout 

Set source extended port VID pruning control (value = TRUE/FALSE)

bcmPortControlExtenderForwardPort 

Set destination port for upstream Extender forwarding (value = local port number)

bcmPortControlExtenderType 

Set Extender port type (enumerated value within bcm_port_extender_type_t)

bcmPortControlExtenderNameSpace 

Set namespace value (value range 0-0xfff)

bcmPortControlEtagPcpDeSelect 

Set source of PCP and DE fields when adding an ETAG to an ingress packet (value = bcm_extender_pcp_de_select_t)

bcmPortControlEtagPcp 

Set default PCP field when adding an ETAG to an ingress packet (value = 0-7)

bcmPortControlEtagDe 

Set default DE field when adding an ETAG to an ingress packet (value = 0-1)

bcmPortControlUseEtagPri 

Use ETAG PCP and DE fields to derive internal priority and color

bcmPortControlProhibitedDot1p 

Set prohibited 802.1p values

bcmPortControlEgressFilterDisable 

Enable/ disable Egress Filtering

bcmPortControlLLFCReceive 

Link Level Flow Control packet receive enable

bcmPortControlLLFCTransmit 

Link Level Flow Control packet transmit enable

Service Aware Flow Control packet receive enable

bcmPortControlSAFCTransmit 

Service Aware Flow Control packet transmit enable

bcmPortControlMacSwap 

Enable or Disable MAC swapping on the port for incoming packet

bcmPortControlOverlayRecycle 

Set port as recycle port for overlay packets second pass

bcmPortControlEvbType 

Set EVB port type (enumerated value within bcm_port_evb_type_t)

bcmPortControlOamLookupWithDvp 

Use DVP as one of the keys for OAM lookup

bcmPortControlSubportTagEnable 

Enable/disable 'third VLAN tag' (subport tag) channelization over Ethernet

bcmPortControlVMac 

Enable/Disable VMAC function.

bcmPortControlEgressModifyDscp 

Enable DSCP/EXP marking. In simple mode enable on port. In advanced mode enable on inlif profile.

bcmPortControlFcoeRouteEnable 

Enables FCOE routing

bcmPortControlFcoeVftEnable 

Controls VFT header expected on port

bcmPortControlFcoeZoneCheckEnable 

Enables zone check

bcmPortControlFcoeSourceBindCheckEnable 

Enables source bind check

bcmPortControlFcoeFpmaPrefixCheckEnable 

Enables FPMA prefix check

bcmPortControlFcoeDoNotLearn 

Disables learning for packets with FCOE EtherType

bcmPortControlFcoeNetworkPort 

Sets whether the port is network (uplink) or not (downfacing)

bcmPortControlFcoeFabricSel 

Selects the source of fabric Id and priority

bcmPortControlFcoeFabricId 

Sets the port default 12-bit fabric Id

bcmPortControlFcoeFabricPri 

Sets the port default fabric priority

bcmPortControlFcoeFcCrcAction 

Sets the FC CRC action to take

bcmPortControlFcoeFcCrcRecompute 

Sets the re-compute CRC options

bcmPortControlFcoeFcEofIgnore 

Sets the control to Ignore EOF

bcmPortControlMcastGroupRemap 

Enable remapping of multicast group index.

bcmPortControlLocalSwitching 

to enable Local route switching on a port

bcmPortControlFecErrorDetectEnable 

Enables marking of failed error correction on the cells

bcmPortControlLowLatencyLLFCEnable 

Enables an improvment in latency on the expense of bandwidth

bcmPortControlErspanEnable 

Enable/Disable ERSPAN mirroring

bcmPortControlPFCXOffTime 

Priority Flow Control xoff time

bcmPortControlOamDefaultProfile 

OAM default profile

bcmPortControlSubportPktTagDrop

Use LLTAG PCP and DE fields to derive internal priority and color

bcmPortControlVlanVpGroupEgress 

VP group for egress vlan membership

bcmPortControlVlanVpGroupIngress 

VP group for ingress vlan membership

bcmPortControlEEEMode 

Select Energy Efficient Ethernet mode

bcmPortControlProbeSerdesReset

bcmPortControlFcoeVsanSel 

Selects the source of VSAN ID and priority

bcmPortControlFcoeVsanId 

Sets the port default 12-bit VSAN ID

bcmPortControlFcoeVsanPri 

Sets the port default VSAN priority

bcmPortControlIPMC4Ucast 

Enable IPMCv4 Unicast MACDA feature on port.

bcmPortControlIPMC6Ucast 

Enable IPMCv6 Unicast MACDA feature on port.

bcmPortControlWredDropCountUpdateEnableQueueMask 

Set the queue mask to enable the WRED dropped counter increase.

bcmPortControlWredDropCountUpdateEnableColorMask 

Set the color mask to enable the WRED dropped counter increase.

bcmPortControlReserved280 

Reserved.

bcmPortControlReserved281 

Reserved.

bcmPortControlRxFastLOS 

Enable/disable accelerated linkscan capability on port

bcmPortControlFcoeTranslateKeyFirst 

The key to use for the first VLAN translate search if the EtherType is FCOE

bcmPortControlFcoeTranslateKeySecond 

The key to use for the second VLAN translate search if the EtherType is FCOE

bcmPortControlMmuDrain 

Draining the cells of the port

bcmPortControlMmuTrafficEnable 

Enable/disable enqueing the packets to the port

bcmPortControlStatCollectionEnable 

Enable/disable the gathering of MIB statistics on the port

bcmPortControlLlfcCellsCongestionIndEnable 

EnableDisable extracting cells congestion indication from LLFC cells

bcmPortControlTrunkLoadBalancingRandomizer 

Assigns the Load Balancing Randomizer-value for LAGs(value = integer between 0 and 15)

bcmPortControlECMPLevel1LoadBalancingRandomizer 

Assigns the Load Balancing Randomizer-value for ECMP (at Level 1 in Two level ECMP)(value = integer between 0 and 15)

bcmPortControlECMPLevel2LoadBalancingRandomizer 

Assigns the Load Balancing Randomizer-value for ECMP at Level 2 in Two Level ECMP(value = integer between 0 and 15)

bcmPortControlMplsExplicitNullEnable 

Enable or disable Explicit NULL termination database

bcmPortControlExtenderEnable 

Enable/disable port extender capability on the port

bcmPortControlSubportTagSize 

Set the CoE egress subport tag size. When set inserts a wide subport tag, else inserts a regular subport tag

bcmPortControlSystemPortOverride 

When set, port group id used for egress VLAN translation is replaced with destination global logical port

bcmPortControlOamDefaultProfileEgress 

OAM default profile for Egress

bcmPortControlPadToSize 

Min packet size in bytes, packets smaller than this value are padded with '0'

bcmPortControlVxlanVpnAssignmentCriteria 

VxLAN vpn assignment criteria

bcmPortControlVxlanTerminationMatchCriteria 

VxLAN termination match criteria

bcmPortControlVxlanGportAssignmentCriteria 

VxLAN virtual port assignment criteria

bcmPortControlOOBFCTxReportIngEnable 

OOB FC Tx Ingress Congestion Notification Enable

bcmPortControlOOBFCTxReportEgrEnable 

OOB FC Tx Egress Congestion Notification Enable

bcmPortControlMplsEncapsulateExtendedLabel 

Encapsulate additional MPLS tunnel on a given outlif

bcmPortControlSampleIngressDest 

Set Ingress sFlow sample destination

bcmPortControlSampleFlexDest 

Set Flex sFlow sample destination

bcmPortControlSampleFlexRate 

Set Flex sFlow sampling rate

bcmPortControlExternalBufferEnable 

Enable/disable the MMU External Buffer on the port

bcmPortControlTrustMimlPri 

If set, use packet priority from MiML header for internal priority mapping

bcmPortControlTrustCustomHeaderPri 

If set, determine internal Priority based on custom header

bcmPortControlCustomHeaderEncapEnable 

If set, enable the capability of custom header encapsulation

bcmPortControlLinkPhyEnable 

Enable LinkPhy on a Port

bcmPortControlOlpEnable 

Enable/disable OLP encapsulation/Decapsulation on a given port

bcmPortControlPortMacOui 

OUI field of PORT specific MAC. Used for OAM and SAT

bcmPortControlPortMacNonOui 

NON OUI field of PORT specific MAC. Used for OAM and SAT

bcmPortControlSatEnable 

Enable/Disable SAT feature.

bcmPortControl1588P2PDelay 

Update path delay in 1588 p2p mechanism.

bcmPortControlSampleIngressEnable 

Enable/Disable ingress port-based sflow.

bcmPortControlSampleEgressEnable 

Enable/Disable egress port-based sflow.

bcmPortControlSampleIngressRate 

Set Ingress sFlow sample rate.

bcmPortControlSampleEgressRate 

Set Egress sFlow sample rate.

bcmPortControlMplsSpeculativeParse 

Enable the speculative parsing of headers over MPLS.

bcmPortControlFieldHiGigClassSelect 

Control classid selection into HG header.

bcmPortControlDvpGroupId 

Configure DVP group value which will be used to compare against SVP for pruning decision

bcmPortControlDvpGroupKnockoutEnable 

Enable/Disable DVP group based pruning. Supported values are 0-Disable, 1-Enable

bcmPortControlUntaggedVlanMember 

Set the VLAN-Membership state per port for packets classified as untagged

bcmPortControlMPLSEncapsulateAdditionalLabel 

Set additional label enable on outgoing LIF

bcmPortControlPreserveDscpIngress 

Preserve DSCP after routing, ingress logical port configuration

bcmPortControlPreserveDscpEgress 

Preserve DSCP after routing, egress logical port configuration

bcmPortControlPWETerminationPortModeEnable 

Enable PWE termination port mode on a port, if enabled, PWE label termination lookup key will be <port+label>

bcmPortControlOuterPolicerRemark 

set/get in-lif profile or map DP profile mapping in-lif profile to remark outer PCP-DEI.

bcmPortControlInnerPolicerRemark 

set/get in-lif profile or map DP profile mapping in-lif profile to remark inner PCP-DEI.

bcmPortControlAllowTtlInheritance 

Enabling Ingress inheritance of TTL per Outgoing Logical interface (consume Out-LIF profile)

bcmPortControlAllowQosInheritance 

Enabling Ingress inheritance DSCP-EXP per Outgoing Logical interface (consume Out-LIF profile)

bcmPortControlPacketTimeStampInsertRx 

Insert RX packet timestamp for packets arriving on the port.

bcmPortControlPacketTimeStampInsertTx 

Insert TX packet timestamp for packets exiting the port.

bcmPortControlPacketTimeStampSrcPortInsertCancel 

Cancel/override both RX and TX time stamp insertions for the packets arriving on the port.

bcmPortControlPacketTimeStampDestPortInsertCancel 

Cancel/override both RX and TX time stamp insertions for the packets exiting the port.

bcmPortControlPacketTimeStampRxId 

Set Source identifier of RX (Ingress) Packet Time Stamp record header.

bcmPortControlPacketTimeStampTxId 

Set Source identifier of TX (Egress) Packet Time Stamp record header.

bcmPortControlPacketTimeStampByteMeterAdjust 

Set if need to adjust meter for packet timestamp.

bcmPortControlDoNotCheckVlanEgress 

Enable/Disable egress VLAN checks for VP port.

bcmPortControlE2EFCTransmitEnable 

Enable E2EFC message transmit.

bcmPortControlE2EFCReceiveEnable 

Enable E2EFC message receive.

bcmPortControlE2EFCCopyToCpuEnable 

Enable E2EFC message copy-to-CPU.

bcmPortControlE2EFCDestMacOui 

E2EFC message destination MAC upper 3 bytes, only for E2EFC TX.

bcmPortControlE2EFCDestMacNonOui 

E2EFC message destination MAC lower 3 bytes, only for E2EFC TX.

bcmPortControlE2EFCSrcMacOui 

E2EFC message source MAC upper 3 bytes, only for E2EFC TX.

bcmPortControlE2EFCSrcMacNonOui 

E2EFC message source MAC lower 3 bytes, only for E2EFC TX.

bcmPortControlE2EFCEtherType 

E2EFC message EtherType/length, only for E2EFC TX.

bcmPortControlE2EFCOpcode 

E2EFC message opcode, only for E2EFC TX.

bcmPortControlForceBridgeForwarding 

Set port to Force Bridge Forwarding.

bcmPortControlIlknRxPathEnable 

Enable/Disable rx path on Ilkn port. Only use with no linkscan

bcmPortControlEgressAclTwoPassEditing 

Enable/Disable egress ACL two pass editing on a recycle port

bcmPortControlLLFCAfterFecEnable 

Enable/Disable FEC on LLFC and congestion indication

bcmPortControlResetSerdes 

Apply reset and relesase reset to SerDes core. Hard resets PCS and PMD

bcmPortControlPONEnable 

Enable or disable pon capability on the port

bcmPortControlLogicalInterfaceSameFilter 

Set or unset Same-interface filtering according to logical-interface ID while incoming and outgoing port-ID will be ignored.

bcmPortControlIPv6TerminationCascadedModeEnable 

Enable per port cascading lookup of IPv6 tunnel termination

bcmPortControlMimUcastTermEnable 

Enable/Disable MiM UC Termination Mode

bcmPortControlMimMcastTermEnable 

Enable/Disable MiM MC and BC Termination Mode

bcmPortControlTXPISDMOverride 

Override TXPI SDM value

bcmPortControlTXPISDMStatus 

The final result value of TXPI SDM

bcmPortControlBicastPort 

Sets the Bicast mapping for port

bcmPortControlObmClassifierPriority 

Indicates the default OBM Traffic class for port

bcmPortControlObmClassifierEnableDscp 

Enable OBM DSCP Classifier on port

bcmPortControlObmClassifierEnableMpls 

Enable OBM MPLS Classifier on port

bcmPortControlObmClassifierEnableEtag 

Enable OBM ETAG Classifier on port

bcmPortControlObmClassifierEtagEthertype 

Configure EtherType for OBM ETAG Classifier

bcmPortControlObmClassifierVntagEthertype 

Configure EtherType for OBM VNTAG Classifier

bcmPortControlControlCellsFecBypassEnable 

Determine if FEC is bypassed by two control cells types: credit cells and flow status cells.

Enable FEC bypass means to NOT do FEC on these controls cells.Disable FEC bypass means to do FEC on these controls cells. This configuration is relevant for RS FEC types only.

bcmPortControlPrbsRxInvertData 

Configure inversion of Rx data

bcmPortControlFcoeTranslateKeyFirstEgress 

The key to use for the first Egress VLAN translate search if the EtherType is FCOE

bcmPortControlFcoeTranslateKeySecondEgress 

The key to use for the second Egress VLAN translate search if the EtherType is FCOE

bcmPortControlIntEnable 

Enable INT at port level

bcmPortControlIntPortMetaData 

Enable per port Metadata inserstion

bcmPortControlIntTurnaround 

Program a egress port as INT turnaround port

bcmPortControlQosRemarkResolution 

Program a egress port QoS resolution(enumerated value within bcm_port_qos_resolution_type_t)

bcmPortControlObmClassifierInternal 

Used to enable/disable internal OBM classification. By default external OBM classification is enabled. Once internal OBM classification is disabled, external OBM classification becomes active.

bcmPortControlWirelessCosMapSelect 

Used to select the wireless cos map for the traffic for a port.

bcmPortControlHiGigCosSelect 

Used to select the HiGig cos for a port.

bcmPortControlTpidSrc 

Used to configure TPID source on VP

bcmPortControlInternalLoopback 

Enable/Disable the port's internal loopback mode

bcmPortConrolEgressVlanPortArpPointed 

Used to configure the index to vlan port per ARP.

bcmPortControlVrrpScalingPort 

Used to enable/disable VRRP scaling per port.

bcmPortControlObmInterruptTypeDropPreempt 

Used to enable obm interrupt for preempt drop.

bcmPortControlObmInterruptTypeDropExpress 

Used to enable obm interrupt for express drop.

bcmPortControlObmInterruptTypeOverflowPreempt 

Used to enable interrupt for preempt overflow

bcmPortControlObmInterruptTypeOverflowExpress 

Used to enable interrupt for express overflow.

bcmPortControlForwardNetworkGroup 

Enable/Disable Forward network group functionality.

Used to configure egress port metadata

bcmPortControlFirstHeaderSize 

Used to configure the size of the first header to skip.

bcmPortControlDistributeLearnMessageMode 

Used to configure distribute learn message mode.

bcmPortControlDiscardEgress 

enable/disable to discard all traffic on that outgoing port.

bcmPortControlIngressEnable 

enable/disable single ingress port.

bcmPortControlRuntThreshold 

configure rxrunt threshold to mac.

bcmPortControlReflectorL2 

configure port to internal reflector without system header.

bcmPortControlRxPriority 

configure port Rx priority.

bcmPortControlIP4TunnelTermEnable 

Enable or disable IPv4 tunnel termination.

bcmPortControlIP6TunnelTermEnable 

Enable or disable IPv6 tunnel termination.

bcmPortControlQoSRemarkEgressEnable 

Enable or disable egress port-based QoS remarking.

bcmPortControlBridgeEgress 

Enable or disable egress port-based bridging.

bcmPortControlLatencyEcnEnable 

Enable or disable latency based ECN on egress port.

bcmPortControlModEnable 

Enable or disable port-based MOD.

bcmPortControlModProfileId 

Designate a MOD profile id to a port.

bcmPortControlLinkFaultLocalClear 

Clear the sticky local_fault_status bit.

bcmPortControlLinkFaultRemoteClear 

Clear the sticky remote_fault_status bit.

bcmPortControlIngressSampleProfile 

Ingress sample profile id.

bcmPortControlPFCFromLLFCEnable 

Enable/disable LLFC RMC threshold to generate PFC on the specified port.

bcmPortControlFirstHeaderSizeAfterInjected 

Used to configure the size of the first header to skip after injected.

bcmPortControlFlexeDoubleNbTdmSlotEnable 

Control the number of slots for FlexE NB TDM calendar for 50G NRZ port with FEC enabled.

bcmPortControlRecycleApp 

Configure Port Recycle application.

bcmPortControlSystemPortInjectedMap 

Enable mapping system port to local-port for injected traffic scenarios.

bcmPortControlPacketTimeStampIngressInsertTx 

Enable to insert TX timestamp on transmitted packets when they are arriving on the ingress port.

bcmPortControlPacketTimeStampIngressInsertTxCancel 

Enable to skip TX timestamp insertion on transmitted packets when they are arriving on the ingress port.

bcmPortControlEgressVlanPriSrc 

Select the source of egress VLAN priority.

bcmPortControlTxStall 

Stall dequeuing packets.

bcmPortControlTxByteState 

Enable TX byte state to update TX byte count that would be inserted into IFA metadata.

bcmPortControlPacketProcssingPort 

Set the packet processing port number.

bcmPortControlIfaEnable 

Enable IFA.

bcmPortControlIoamEnable 

Enable IOAM.

bcmPortControlPFCStatus 

Get port's current received PFCs status.

bcmPortControlRoeLinkdownTransmit 

For the given ROE port tx traffic is enabled even if link is downt.

bcmPortControlRoeLinkdownReceive 

For the given ROE port rx traffic is enabled even if link is down.

bcmPortControlEgressPktPriCfiCopyIngressEnable

bcmPortControlEgressTosCopyIngressEnable 

Enable or disable egress TOS copy on ingress port.

bcmPortControlEgressL2OpaqueTag

◆ bcm_phy_config_t_init()

◆ bcm_port_ability_advert_get()

int bcm_port_ability_advert_get ( int  unit,
bcm_port_t  port,
bcm_port_ability_t *  ability_mask 
)

Set or retrieve auto-negotiation abilities for a port.

Set or retrieve the current auto-negotiation abilities for the specified port. If the port is currently operating with auto-negotiation disabled, these settings will be programmed into the underlying devices but not have an affect until auto-negotiation is enabled. If auto-negotiation is enabled when the settings are changed, auto-negotiation must be restarted using bcm_port_autoneg_set . Setting or retrieving the currently set ability structure can be done at any time, including with auto-negotiation disabled. The setting will only take affect when auto-negotiation is enabled or restarted. See bcm_port_autoneg_set for details on enabling or restarting auto-negotiation. On 5656x, 5676x, 5686x and 5697x class of chips, advertising a speed on a port that is not supported by the port block (because of the PLL parameters) may result in a failure during configuring the port to the resolved speed even if auto-negotiation succeeds. There are also other restrictions in the chip for these class of chips (E.g., different ports within a port block cannot have different speeds when the port block is configured in oversub calendar) which can cause reconfiguring the port to fail. All the limitations/restrictions of the chip and port block will be documented in the data sheet for the respective chips. In such a case a switch event BCM_SWITCH_EVENT_AUTONEG_SPEED_ERROR will be generated to notify the user of the failure. See switch_events . It is expected that application software either disables autoneg or remove the failing speed from the advertisements and restart autoneg.

Parameters
[in]unitUnit number.
[in]portPhysical or logical port to query or set information on.
[out]ability_maskExtended abilities structure, EXTENDED_PORT_ABILITY_s .

◆ bcm_port_ability_advert_set()

int bcm_port_ability_advert_set ( int  unit,
bcm_port_t  port,
bcm_port_ability_t *  ability_mask 
)

Set or retrieve auto-negotiation abilities for a port.

Set or retrieve the current auto-negotiation abilities for the specified port. If the port is currently operating with auto-negotiation disabled, these settings will be programmed into the underlying devices but not have an affect until auto-negotiation is enabled. If auto-negotiation is enabled when the settings are changed, auto-negotiation must be restarted using bcm_port_autoneg_set . Setting or retrieving the currently set ability structure can be done at any time, including with auto-negotiation disabled. The setting will only take affect when auto-negotiation is enabled or restarted. See bcm_port_autoneg_set for details on enabling or restarting auto-negotiation. On 5656x, 5676x, 5686x and 5697x class of chips, advertising a speed on a port that is not supported by the port block (because of the PLL parameters) may result in a failure during configuring the port to the resolved speed even if auto-negotiation succeeds. There are also other restrictions in the chip for these class of chips (E.g., different ports within a port block cannot have different speeds when the port block is configured in oversub calendar) which can cause reconfiguring the port to fail. All the limitations/restrictions of the chip and port block will be documented in the data sheet for the respective chips. In such a case a switch event BCM_SWITCH_EVENT_AUTONEG_SPEED_ERROR will be generated to notify the user of the failure. See switch_events . It is expected that application software either disables autoneg or remove the failing speed from the advertisements and restart autoneg.

Parameters
[in]unitUnit number.
[in]portPhysical or logical port to query or set information on.
[in]ability_maskExtended abilities structure, EXTENDED_PORT_ABILITY_s .

◆ bcm_port_ability_t_init()

void bcm_port_ability_t_init ( bcm_port_ability_t *  ability)

Initialize a Port Ability structure.

Initializes a port abilities structure to default values. This function should be used to initialize any Port Ability structure prior to filling it out and passing it to an API function. This ensures that subsequent API releases may add new structure members to the bcm_port_ability_t structure, and bcm_port_ability_t_init will initialize the new members to correct default values.

Parameters
[in,out]ability
Return values
NONE.

◆ bcm_port_add()

int bcm_port_add ( int  unit,
bcm_port_t  port,
uint32  flags,
bcm_port_interface_info_t *  interface_info,
bcm_port_mapping_info_t *  mapping_info 
)

add/remove/get port

Allows for dynamic NIF port configuration changes. Calling bcm_petra_port_add must be done on detached ports.

bcm_port_interface_config_t
Field Type Description
phy_port uint32 related physical port (first physical port for multi-lane interfaces)
interface bcm_port_if_t interface of port (See BCM_PORT_IF_types table for supported interface types)
num_lanes uint32 number of lanes the interface occupies
phy_pbmp bcm_pbmp_t bitmap of phy lanes occupied by the interface(relevant only for ILKN interface)
interface_id uint32 interface id(relevant only for ILKN interface)
max_speed int The supported port max speed via legacy flex port operations, i.e. the max speed provisioned through soc property port_map.

bcm_port_mapping_info_t
Field Type Description
channel uint32 related port channel
core int related port core id
tm_port uint32 corresponding tm port
base_q_pair uint32 corresponding base queue pair (relevant in case BCM_PORT_ADD_BASE_Q_PAIR_WITH_ID flag is set)
num_priorities uint32 ports number of priorities
base_uc_queue uint32 base of unicast queue
num_uc_queue uint32 number of unicast queue
base_mc_queue uint32 base of mcast queue
num_mc_queue uint32 number of mcast queue

Port add Flags
Flag Meaning
BCM_PORT_ADD_BASE_Q_PAIR_WITH_ID The id of base queue pair is given in bcm_port_mapping_info_t strcuture.
BCM_PORT_ADD_CONFIG_CHANNELIZED The added port if part of an channelized interface (relevant for non-Interlaken interfaces).
BCM_PORT_ADD_CGM_AUTO_ADJUST_DISABLE disable CGM default adjustments, if set the user is responsible for CGM configuration.
BCM_PORT_ADD_HIGH_GIG Indicate a high gig port.
BCM_PORT_ADD_DONT_PROBE Don't probe(initialize SerDes and MAC) the new physical interface.
BCM_PORT_ADD_USE_PHY_PBMP Use phy_pbmp parameter to indicate interface lanes.
BCM_PORT_ADD_TDM_QUEUING_ON TDM queuing is on for this port, it's handled as a TDM interleaved port.
BCM_PORT_ADD_TDM_PORT Indicate a new TDM port.
BCM_PORT_ADD_IF_TDM_ONLY Indicate if the interface will have only TDM ports
BCM_PORT_ADD_IF_TDM_HYBRID Indicate if the interface will have ome TDM ports and some NON-TDM ports
BCM_PORT_ADD_KBP_PORT Inidicate that port is allocated for KBP
BCM_PORT_ADD_STIF_PORT Inidicate that port is allocated for Statistic Interface
BCM_PORT_ADD_RCY_MIRROR_PRIORITY_HIGH Inidicate that the high proirty contex will be allocated for the port
BCM_PORT_ADD_RCY_MIRROR_PRIORITY_NORMAL Inidicate that the normal proirty contex will be allocated for the port
BCM_PORT_ADD_ILKN_OVER_FABRIC_PORT Indicate it is an over fabric port
BCM_PORT_ADD_CROSS_CONNECT Indicate it is a cross connect port
BCM_PORT_ADD_SCH_ONLY Add scheduler only to existing port
PORT_ADD_INGRESS_INTERLEAVING_ENABLE Indicates ingress interface interleaving enable
PORT_ADD_STIF_AND_DATA_PORT Indicate it is a statistics interface port with data traffic capabilities

Port interfaces
Flag Meaning
BCM_PORT_IF_SGMII SGMII interface.
BCM_PORT_IF_CAUI CAUI interface.
BCM_PORT_IF_RXAUI RXAUI interface.
BCM_PORT_IF_XFI XFI interface.
BCM_PORT_IF_XLAUI XLAUI interface.
BCM_PORT_IF_ILKN INTERLAKEN interface.
BCM_PORT_IF_XAUI XAUI interface.
BCM_PORT_IF_CPU CPU interface (phy port must be 0).
BCM_PORT_IF_EVENTOR Eventor interface (phy port must be 0).
BCM_PORT_IF_RCY_MIRROR Recycle mirror interface (phy port must be 0).
BCM_PORT_IF_SCH SCH interface.
Parameters
[in]unitUnit number.
[in]portDevice or logical port number.
[in]flags(for "_set") See BCM_PORT_ADD_flags for details.
(for "_get") See BCM_PORT_ADD_flags for details.
[in]interface_info(for "_set") The requested interface configuration.
(for "_get") The requested interface configuration.
[in]mapping_info(for "_set") The requested port mapping configuration.
(for "_get") The requested port mapping configuration.

int bcm_port_advert_remote_get ( int  unit,

bcm_port_abil_t *  ability_mask 
)

Set or retrieve autonegotiation settings for a port.

Parameters
[in]unitUnit number.
[in]port
[out]ability_mask

◆ bcm_port_advert_set()

int bcm_port_advert_set ( int  unit,
bcm_port_t  port,
bcm_port_abil_t  ability_mask 
)

Set or retrieve autonegotiation settings for a port.

Parameters
[in]unitUnit number.
[in]port
[in]ability_mask

◆ bcm_port_autoneg_ability_advert_get()

int bcm_port_autoneg_ability_advert_get ( int  unit,
bcm_port_t  port,
int  max_num_ability,
bcm_port_speed_ability_t *  abilities_array,
int *  actual_num_ability 
)

Set or get a port advertised speed on BCM56980.

bcm_port_autoneg_ability_advert_set can be used to set a number of autoneg ability of a port for BCM56980. If any of these ability is invalid or not supported by this chip, BCM_E_PARAM will be returned. bcm_port_autoneg_ability_advert_get should be used to retrieve all the avertised ability of a port, if the actual number of ability is greater than max_num_ability, then BCM_E_PARAM will be returned, otherwise actual_num_ability will be updated.

// speed_ability supported by a port
typedef struct bcm_port_speed_ability_s {
uint32 speed; // port speed in mbps
uint32 resolved_num_lanes; // autoneg resolved speed num lane
bcm_port_phy_fec_t fec_type; // fec_type for port
bcm_port_medium_t medium; // medium type of a port
bcm_port_phy_pause_t pause; // pause
bcm_port_phy_channel_t channel; // short/long channel for a port
bcm_port_autoneg_mode_t an_mode; // autoneg mode
} bcm_port_speed_ability_t;
Parameters
[in]unitUnit number.
[in]portDevice port number or logical device
Device port number or logical device
[in]max_num_abilitymax number of ability to advertise
[out]abilities_array
[out]actual_num_ability

◆ bcm_port_autoneg_ability_advert_set()

int bcm_port_autoneg_ability_advert_set ( int  unit,
bcm_port_t  port,
int  num_ability,
bcm_port_speed_ability_t *  abilities_array 
)

Set or get a port advertised speed on BCM56980.

bcm_port_autoneg_ability_advert_set can be used to set a number of autoneg ability of a port for BCM56980. If any of these ability is invalid or not supported by this chip, BCM_E_PARAM will be returned. bcm_port_autoneg_ability_advert_get should be used to retrieve all the avertised ability of a port, if the actual number of ability is greater than max_num_ability, then BCM_E_PARAM will be returned, otherwise actual_num_ability will be updated.

// speed_ability supported by a port
typedef struct bcm_port_speed_ability_s {
uint32 speed; // port speed in mbps
uint32 resolved_num_lanes; // autoneg resolved speed num lane
bcm_port_phy_fec_t fec_type; // fec_type for port
bcm_port_medium_t medium; // medium type of a port
bcm_port_phy_pause_t pause; // pause
bcm_port_phy_channel_t channel; // short/long channel for a port
bcm_port_autoneg_mode_t an_mode; // autoneg mode
} bcm_port_speed_ability_t;
Parameters
[in]unitUnit number.
[in]portDevice port number or logical device
Device port number or logical device
[in]num_abilitynumber of ability to advertise
[in]abilities_array

◆ bcm_port_autoneg_ability_remote_get()

int bcm_port_autoneg_ability_remote_get ( int  unit,
bcm_port_t  port,
int  max_num_ability,
bcm_port_speed_ability_t *  abilities_array,
int *  actual_num_ability 
)

Get a port link partner advertised speed on BCM56980.

bcm_port_autoneg_ability_remote_get should be used to retrieve all the avertised ability of remote link partner of a port. if the actual number of ability is greater than max_num_ability, then BCM_E_PARAM will be returned, otherwise actual_num_ability will be updated.

// speed_ability supported by a port
typedef struct bcm_port_speed_ability_s {
uint32 speed; // port speed in mbps
uint32 resolved_num_lanes; // autoneg resolved speed num lane
bcm_port_phy_fec_t fec_type; // fec_type for port
bcm_port_medium_t medium; // medium type of a port
bcm_port_phy_pause_t pause; // pause
bcm_port_phy_channel_t channel; // short/long channel for a port
bcm_port_autoneg_mode_t an_mode; // autoneg mode
} bcm_port_speed_ability_t;

[in]max_num_abilitymax number of ability to advertise
[out]abilities_array
[out]actual_num_ability

◆ bcm_port_autoneg_get()

int bcm_port_autoneg_get ( int  unit,
bcm_port_t  port,
int *  autoneg 
)

Configure or retrieve the current auto-negotiation settings for a port, or restart auto-negotiation if already enabled.

Enable, disable, or recover the current auto-negotiation state for a port. If auto-negotiation is already enabled, re-enabling it will restart auto-negotiation. Before enabling auto-negotiation, the desired advertised modes must be configured using bcm_port_ability_advert_set .

Parameters
[in]unitUnit number.
[in]portDevice or logical port number
[out]autoneg0 for disable, 1 for enabled

◆ bcm_port_autoneg_set()

int bcm_port_autoneg_set ( int  unit,
bcm_port_t  port,
int  autoneg 
)

Configure or retrieve the current auto-negotiation settings for a port, or restart auto-negotiation if already enabled.

Enable, disable, or recover the current auto-negotiation state for a port. If auto-negotiation is already enabled, re-enabling it will restart auto-negotiation. Before enabling auto-negotiation, the desired advertised modes must be configured using bcm_port_ability_advert_set .

Parameters
[in]unitUnit number.
[in]portDevice or logical port number
[in]autoneg0 for disable, 1 for enabled

◆ bcm_port_bpdu_enable_get()

int bcm_port_bpdu_enable_get ( int  unit,
bcm_port_t  port,
int *  enable 
)

Enable or disable BPDU processing on a port.

Enable or disable BPDU packet processing. If disabled, BPDU packets ingressing on the specified port are discarded. If enabled, normal BPDU processing occurs. bcm_port_bpdu_enable_set enables or disables the current mode while bcm_port_bpdu_enable_get retrieves the current operating mode. This BPDU setting applies to all BPDU addresses defined using bcm_l2_bpdu_set .

Parameters
[in]unitUnit number.
[in]portDevice or logical port number
[out]enableTRUE (1) to enable BPDU processing, FALSE (0) to disable

◆ bcm_port_bpdu_enable_set()

int bcm_port_bpdu_enable_set ( int  unit,
bcm_port_t  port,
int  enable 
)

Enable or disable BPDU processing on a port.

Enable or disable BPDU packet processing. If disabled, BPDU packets ingressing on the specified port are discarded. If enabled, normal BPDU processing occurs. bcm_port_bpdu_enable_set enables or disables the current mode while bcm_port_bpdu_enable_get retrieves the current operating mode. This BPDU setting applies to all BPDU addresses defined using bcm_l2_bpdu_set .

Parameters
[in]unitUnit number.
[in]portDevice or logical port number
[in]enableTRUE (1) to enable BPDU processing, FALSE (0) to disable

◆ bcm_port_buffer_pbmp_get()

int bcm_port_buffer_pbmp_get ( int  unit,
int  buffer_id,
bcm_pbmp_t *  pbmp 
)

Get the port btimap of a given packet buffer.

Get the port bitmap of a given packet buffer.

Parameters
[in]unitUnit number.
[in]buffer_idBuffer ID.
[out]pbmpPort bitmap of the given packet buffer.

◆ bcm_port_cable_diag()

int bcm_port_cable_diag ( int  unit,
bcm_port_t  port,
bcm_port_cable_diag_t *  status 
)

Perform cable diagnostics on the specified port.

For PHYs that support cable diagnostics, this call runs a suite of diagnostic tests on the specified port and returns useful information such as the length of the cable, number of valid pairs, and the length and state of each pair. This information can be useful for detecting and isolating faults along the cable length or for doing a sanity check while troubleshooting network connectivity problems. Table BCM_PORT_CABLE_DIAG_t describes the meaning of each field of the structure returned by this call

bcm_port_cable_diag_t
Field BCM Type Description
state bcm_port_cable_state_t Overall state of the cable
npairs int Number of valid pairs
pair_state[4] bcm_port_cable_state_t State of each pair
pair_len[4] int Length of each pair in metres
fuzz_len int Exact length is +/- fuzz_len

The valid values for Cable/Pair state are described in Table PORT_CABLE_STATE_table .

"Cable/Pair" State Values
BCM_PORT_CABLE_STATE_OK Cable/Pair state is fine.
BCM_PORT_CABLE_STATE_OPEN Cable/Pair state is Open.
BCM_PORT_CABLE_STATE_SHORT Cable/Pair state is Short.
BCM_PORT_CABLE_STATE_OPENSHORT Cable/Pair state is Open or Short.
BCM_PORT_CABLE_STATE_UNKNOWN Cable/Pair state is Unknown.
Parameters
[in]unitUnit number.
[in]portDevice port number
[out]statusPointer to cable diagnostics status structure populated on successful return.

◆ bcm_port_cfi_color_get()

int bcm_port_cfi_color_get ( int  unit,
bcm_port_t  port,
int  cfi,
bcm_color_t *  color 
)

Set or retrieve color assignment for a given port and Canonical Format Indicator (CFI).

Assign or examine the color with which packets are marked when they arrive on the given port with the specified Canonical Format Indicator (CFI) in the VLAN control index.

Parameters
[in]unitUnit number.
[in]portDevice or logical port number
[in]cfiVLAN Canonical Format Indicator (CFI)
[out]colorOne of the BCM color selections: bcmColorGreen, bcmColorYellow, bcmColorRed, bcmColorDropFirst, bcmColorPreserve

bcm_color_t  color

◆ bcm_port_class_get()

int bcm_port_class_get ( int  unit,
bcm_port_t  port,
bcm_port_class_t  pclass,
uint32 *  class_id 
)

Set or get port classification ID to aggregate a group of ports for further processing such as VLAN translation and field processing.

Set or get port classification ID to aggregate a group of ports for further processing such as VLAN translation and field processing. The class types are shown in bcm_port_class_t:

bcm_port_class_t
bcmPortClassFieldLookup Class for field stage Lookup
bcmPortClassFieldIngress Class for field stage Ingress
bcmPortClassFieldEgress Class for field stage Egress
bcmPortClassVlanTranslateEgress Class for egress VLAN translation
bcmPortClassIngress Class for ingress basis grouping
bcmPortClassId Class for mapping local-port to vlan-domain. vlan domain is used in mapping packet VID to Vlan
bcmPortClassFieldIngressPacketProcessing Packet processing port Class lower 32 bits for field stage Ingress
bcmPortClassFieldEgressPacketProcessing Packet processing port Class for field stage Egress
bcmPortClassL2Lookup Class for L2 lookup
bcmPortClassForwardIngress Class for ingress forwarding
bcmPortClassForwardEgress Class for egress forwarding
bcmPortClassFieldIngressVlanTranslation Class for field stage Ingress Vlan Translation
bcmPortClassFieldIngressTunnelTerminated Class for field stage Ingress Tunnel Terminated
bcmPortClassProgramEditorEgressPacketProcessing Class for Egress Programmable Editor properties
bcmPortClassProgramEditorEgressTrafficManagement Traffic management port Class for field stage Egress
bcmPortClassEgress Class for field stage Egress
bcmPortClassFieldIngressGroupSel Per port class id used as key for field stage ingress group selection
bcmPortClassFieldIngressSystemPort Class for virtual port instance of SGLP in IFP IPBM key
bcmPortClassFieldIngressSourceGport Class for virtual port instance of SVP in IFP IPBM key
bcmPortClassFieldIngressDevicePort Class for virtual port instance of device port in IFP IPBM key
bcmPortClassVlanTranslateIngress Class for ingress VLAN translation
bcmPortClassFieldIngressPacketProcessingHigh Packet processing port Class high 32 bits for field stage Ingress
PortClassVlanMember Class for VLAN Membership
PortClassFieldIngressVport Class for LIF encoded as Gport in the Field Ingres stages
PortClassFieldEgressVport Class for LIF encoded as Gport in the Field stage ePMF
PortClassFieldIngressPMF1PacketProcessingPort Class for packet processing port in Field stage iPMF1
PortClassFieldIngressPMF1PacketProcessingPortCs Context selection class for packet processing port in Field stage iPMF1
PortClassFieldIngressPMF3PacketProcessingPort Class for packet processing port in Field stage iPMF
PortClassFieldIngressPMF3PacketProcessingPortCs Context selection class for packet processing port in Field stage iPMF3
PortClassFieldEgressPacketProcessingPort Class for packet processing port in Field stage ePMF
PortClassFieldEgressPacketProcessingPortCs Context selection class for packet processing port in Field stage ePMF
PortClassFieldExternalPacketProcessingPortCs Context selection class for packet processing port in Field stage external
PortClassFieldIngressPMF1TrafficManagementPort Class for traffic management port in Field stage iPMF1
PortClassFieldIngressPMF1TrafficManagementPortCs Context selection class for traffic management port in Field stage iPMF1
PortClassFieldIngressPMF3TrafficManagementPort Class for traffic management port in Field stage iPMF3
PortClassFieldIngressPMF3TrafficManagementPortCs Context selection class for traffic management port in Field stage iPMF
PortClassFieldEgressTrafficManagementPort Class for traffic management processing port in Field stage ePMF
PortClassFieldExternalTrafficManagementPortCs Context selection class for traffic management port in Field stage external
bcmPortClassOpaqueCtrlId Opaque control ID available for IFP key selection
bcmPortClassEgressOpaqueCtrlId Opaque control ID available for EFP key selection
bcmPortClassOpaqueCtrlId1 Opaque control ID available for VFP key selection
bcmPortClassOpaqueCtrlId2 Opaque control ID A for flex digest and VFP key selection
bcmPortClassOpaqueCtrlId3 Opaque control ID B for flex digest and VFP key selection
bcmPortClassCount Last enum value

bcm_port_phy_control_flow_control_mode_t
bcmPortPhyControlFlowCtrlModeNone No flow control mode (Relay mode).
bcmPortPhyControlFlowCtrlLegacyPauseEn Lagacy Pause flow control mode.
bcmPortPhyControlFlowCtrlPfcPause PFC flow control mode.
bcmPortPhyControlFlowCtrlLlfc LLFC flow control mode.

bcm_port_field_egress_class_select_t
bcmPortEgressClassSelectNone Class Id Not Assigned.
bcmPortEgressClassSelectPort Class Id from Port Interface.
bcmPortEgressClassSelectSvp Class Id from SVP.
bcmPortEgressClassSelectL3Interface Class Id from L3 IIF Interface.
bcmPortEgressClassSelectFieldSrc Class Id from VFP HI.
bcmPortEgressClassSelectFieldDst Class Id from VFP LOW.
bcmPortEgressClassSelectL2Src Class Id from L2 SRC.
bcmPortEgressClassSelectL2Dst Class Id from L2 DST.
bcmPortEgressClassSelectL3Src Class Id from L3 SRC.
bcmPortEgressClassSelectL3Dst Class Id from L3 DST.
bcmPortEgressClassSelectVlan Class Id from VLAN Interface.
bcmPortEgressClassSelectVrf Class Id from VRF.
bcmPortEgressClassSelectFieldIngress Class Id from IFP Policy Table.

bcm_port_field_higig_class_select_t
bcmPortFieldHiGigClassSelectNone Class Id Not Assigned.
bcmPortFieldHiGigClassSelectIngressToEgress Class Id passed from ingress to egress.
bcmPortFieldHiGigClassSelectL3Egress Class Id from L3 egress object.
bcmPortFieldHiGigClassSelectL3EgressIntf Class Id from L3 egress interface.
bcmPortFieldHiGigClassSelectEgressGport Class Id from egress dvp.

In case of setting bcmPortClassVlanTranslateEgress, this API will block the usage of bcm_vlan_translate_egress_XXX API on any device that supports bcm_vlan_translate_egress_action_XXX API

Parameters
[in]unitUnit number.
[in]portDevice or logical port number
[in]pclass
[out]class_id(for "_set") Device Class ID.
(for "_get", OUT) Device Class ID.

◆ bcm_port_clear()

int bcm_port_clear ( int  unit)

Initialize the port subsystem without affecting the current state of stack ports.

Clear the current port subsystem state for the specified device, without changing the state of stack link ports. This function used in conjunction with the corresponding bcm_xxx_clear APIs in other modules can be used to re-initialize a unit without causing a link status change on known stack ports. This API can be used in conjunction with the Broadcom Stacking software to reset a unit into a known state after it has joined an existing stack.

Parameters
[in]unitUnit number.
Return values
BCM_E_NONE
BCM_E_XXX

◆ bcm_port_config_get()

int bcm_port_config_get ( int  unit,
bcm_port_config_t *  config 
)

Retrieved the port configuration for the specified device.

bcm_port_config_get returns all known ports configured on the specified device. The logical information indicates port bit maps to represent the ports on the specified unit (see the Broadcom Network Switching Stacking Guide for a description of logical port lists). BCM_PORT_CONFIG_t describes the meaning of each field.

bcm_port_config_t
Field BCM Type Description
fe bcm_pbmp_t Bitmap or logical port list of FE ports
ge bcm_pbmp_t Bitmap or logical port list of GbE ports
xe bcm_pbmp_t Bitmap or logical port list of 10G ports
ce bcm_pbmp_t Bitmap or logical port list of 100G ports
e bcm_pbmp_t Bitmap or logical port list of Ethernet ports
hg bcm_pbmp_t Bitmap or logical port list of HiGig ports
sci bcm_pbmp_t Bitmap or logical port list of SCI ports
sfi bcm_pbmp_t Bitmap or logical port list of SFI ports
spi bcm_pbmp_t Bitmap or logical port list of SPI ports
spi_subport bcm_pbmp_t Bitmap or logical port list of SPI subports
port bcm_pbmp_t Bitmap or logical port list of all ports
CPU bcm_pbmp_t Bitmap or logical port list of CPU ports
all bcm_pbmp_t Bitmap or logical port list of all ports
stack_int bcm_pbmp_t Mask of internal stacked ports (Deprecated)
stack_ext bcm_pbmp_t Bitmap or logical port list of all stack ports
tdm bcm_pbmp_t Bitmap or logical port list of all TDM ports
PON bcm_pbmp_t Bitmap or logical port list of all PON ports
llid bcm_pbmp_t Bitmap or logical port list of all LLID ports
il bcm_pbmp_t Bitmap or logical port list of all ILKN ports
xl bcm_pbmp_t Bitmap or logical port list of all XLAUI ports
rcy bcm_pbmp_t Bitmap or logical port list of all RECYCLE ports
per_pipe bcm_pbmp_t[BCM_PIPES_MAX] Array of bitmaps or logical ports per pipe. The number of pipes per device can be obtained via num_pipes field of bcm_info_t .
nif bcm_pbmp_t Bitmap or logical port list of all network ports
control bcm_pbmp_t Bitmap or logical port list of all Network Interfaces ports
eventor bcm_pbmp_t Mask of Eventor ports
control bcm_pbmp_t Mask of OLP ports
control bcm_pbmp_t Mask of OAMP ports
control bcm_pbmp_t Mask of ERP ports
control bcm_pbmp_t Mask of mirror recycle ports (sniff ports)
per_pp_pipe bcm_pbmp_t[BCM_PP_PIPES_MAX] Array of bitmaps or logical ports per PP pipe. The number of PP pipes per device can be obtained via num_pp_pipes field of bcm_info_t .
Parameters
[in]unitUnit number.
[out]configPointer to port configuration structure populated on successful return.
Return values
BCM_E_NONE
BCM_E_XXX

◆ bcm_port_config_phy_oam_get()

int bcm_port_config_phy_oam_get ( int  unit,
bcm_port_t  port,
bcm_port_config_phy_oam_t *  conf 
)

Gets OAM configurations for the PHY.

This function gets the OAM configurations set on the PHY for the specified port.Please refer BCM_PORT_CONFIG_PHY_OAM_T

Parameters
[in]unitUnit number.
[in]portDevice or logical port number
[out]conf

◆ bcm_port_config_phy_oam_set()

int bcm_port_config_phy_oam_set ( int  unit,
bcm_port_t  port,
bcm_port_config_phy_oam_t *  conf 
)

Set OAM configurations for the PHY.

This function sets OAM configurations on the PHY for the specified port. The OAM configuration allows to configure OAM delay measurement on Tx and Rx independently. The OAM delay measurement configuration must select the mode of operation from the choices provided such as Y1731, BHH or IETF.

bcm_port_config_phy_oam_t
Field BCM Type Description
tx_dm_config bcm_port_config_phy_oam_dm_t Delay Measurement Config for Tx BCM_PORT_CONFIG_PHY_OAM_DM_T
rx_dm_config bcm_port_config_phy_oam_dm_t Delay Measurement Config for Rx BCM_PORT_CONFIG_PHY_OAM_DM_T
typedef struct bcm_port_config_phy_oam_s {
bcm_port_config_phy_oam_dm_t tx_dm_config; // OAM delay measurement config for Tx
bcm_port_config_phy_oam_dm_t rx_dm_config; // OAM delay measurement config for Rx
} bcm_port_config_phy_oam_t;

bcm_port_config_phy_oam_dm_t
Field BCM Type Description
flags uint32 OAM Delay Measurement Config flags OAM_DM_CONFIGURATION_FLAGS_table
mode bcm_port_config_phy_oam_dm_mode_t OAM Delay Measurement Mode OAM_DM_CONFIGURATION_MODE_table
typedef struct bcm_port_config_phy_oam_dm_s {
uint32 flags; // OAM Delay Measurement config flags
bcm_port_config_phy_oam_dm_mode_t mode; // OAM Delay Measurement mode Y.1731, BHH or IETF
} bcm_port_config_phy_oam_dm_t;

OAM Configuration Flags
Flags Description
BCM_PORT_PHY_OAM_DM_MAC_CHECK_ENABLE Enable MAC check for delay measurement
BCM_PORT_PHY_OAM_DM_CONTROL_WORD_ENABLE Enable control word for delay measurement
BCM_PORT_PHY_OAM_DM_ENTROPY_ENABLE Enable entropy for delay measurement
BCM_PORT_PHY_OAM_DM_TS_FORMAT Select timestamp format for delay measurement. PTP(0)/NTP(1)

OAM Delay Measurement Modes
Mode Description
bcmPortConfigPhyOamDmModeY1731 OAM Delay Measurement Y.1731 Mode
bcmPortConfigPhyOamDmModeBhh OAM Delay Measurement BHH Mode
bcmPortConfigPhyOamDmModeIetf OAM Delay Measurement IETF Mode
Parameters
[in]unitUnit number.
[in]portDevice or logical port number
[in]conf

◆ bcm_port_config_t_init()

void bcm_port_config_t_init ( bcm_port_config_t *  pconfig)

Initialize a Port Configuration structure.

Initializes a port configuration structure to default values. This function should be used to initialize any Port Configuration structure prior to filling it out and passing it to an API function. This ensures that subsequent API releases may add new structure members to the bcm_port_config_t structure, and bcm_port_config_t_init will initialize the new members to correct default values.

Parameters
[in,out]pconfigPointer to Port Configuration structure to initialize.
Return values
NONE.

◆ bcm_port_congestion_config_get()

int bcm_port_congestion_config_get ( int  unit,
bcm_gport_t  port,
bcm_port_congestion_config_t *  config 
)

Configure/retrieve flow control protocol mode.

Configure/retrieve flow control protocol mode. On XCore?fabric devices, this API is invoked after bcm_cosq_gport_flow_control_set and bcm_fabric_congestion_size_set . On XGS devices, this API configures the end-to-end congestion control (E2ECC) message transmit and receive operations. The E2ECC operations are controlled by the BCM_PORT_CONGESTION_CONFIG_E2ECC, _TX, and _RX flags. For example, setting the _E2ECC flag to 1, _TX flag to 1, and _RX flag to 0 enables the E2ECC transmit operation but disables the receive operation. In the bcm_port_congestion_config_t structure, the member port_bits is reserved and should be set to zeroes. The member packets_per_se c controls the refresh rate of E2ECC messages and can range from 40 to 4 million. The refresh rate can also be set to 0, which means an E2ECC message is transmitted only when congestion status changes. The refresh rate is a device-wide parameter, not per port. Hence, the rate will be determined by the most recent call to bcm_port_congestion_config_set in which both the _E2ECC and _TX flags are set, and it will apply to all ports. The members src_port, multicast_id, traffic_class, and color speci fy the HiGig header fields of the E2ECC message. The members src_mac, dest_mac, ethertype, and opcode specify the Ethernet header fields of the E2ECC message.For BCM5645x(katana2) the api is applicable for ge ports as well.

bcm_port_congestion_config_t
Field BCM Type Description
flags uint32 congestion mode PORT_CONGESTION_FLAGS_table
port_bits uint8 reserved
packets_per_sec int frequency of sending congestion messages
src_port bcm_gport_t gport of type modid:port, wildcard on receive
multicast_id uint16 Multicast Identifier
traffic_class bcm_cos_t Traffic Class
color bcm_color_t Color
vlan bcm_vlan_t Vlan
pri uint8 Packet priority
cfi uint8 Canonical Format Indicator (CFI)
src_mac bcm_mac_t Source MAC address
dest_mac bcm_mac_t Destination MAC address
ethertype uint16 Ethernet Type
opcode uint16 Opcode
version uint8 QCN PDU version
reserved_v uint8 QCN PDU reserved_v
dst_port bcm_gport_t gport of type mmodid:port

Port Congestion flags
Name Description
BCM_PORT_CONGESTION_CONFIG_E2ECC E2ECC format
BCM_PORT_CONGESTION_CONFIG_HCFC HCFC format
BCM_PORT_CONGESTION_CONFIG_DESTMOD_FLOW_CONTROL To set, DMVOQ specific configuration
BCM_PORT_CONGESTION_CONFIG_DESTMODPORT_FLOW_CONTROL To set, DPVOQ specific configuration
BCM_PORT_CONGESTION_CONFIG_E2ECC_COE_STRICT_MODE To enable E2ECC FC on COE port in strict mode
BCM_PORT_CONGESTION_CONFIG_E2ECC_COE_FLEX_MODE To enable E2ECC FC on COE port in flex mode
BCM_PORT_CONGESTION_CONFIG_MAX_SPLIT4 Split mode
BCM_PORT_CONGESTION_CONFIG_TX Tx operation
BCM_PORT_CONGESTION_CONFIG_RX Rx operation
BCM_PORT_CONGESTION_CONFIG_SAFC SAFC format
BCM_PORT_CONGESTION_CONFIG_QCN QCN congestion
BCM_PORT_CONGESTION_CONFIG_DEST_PORT_VALID If set, the Destination is set according to the packet source. When set to 0, the Destination is set per Port.
BCM_PORT_CONGESTION_CONFIG_VLAN_PAUSE_COE To enable COE FC through VLAN PAUSE message.
BCM_PORT_CONGESTION_CONFIG_COPY_TO_CPU To copy the received flow control message to CPU (Supported for COE FC) .
Parameters
[in]unitUnit number.
[in]portHiGig port
[in,out]config(for "_set") port configuration. see table PORT_CONGESTION_CONFIG_t
(for "_get") port configuration. see table PORT_CONGESTION_CONFIG_t

◆ bcm_port_congestion_config_set()

int bcm_port_congestion_config_set ( int  unit,
bcm_gport_t  port,
bcm_port_congestion_config_t *  config 
)

Configure/retrieve flow control protocol mode.

Configure/retrieve flow control protocol mode. On XCore?fabric devices, this API is invoked after bcm_cosq_gport_flow_control_set and bcm_fabric_congestion_size_set . On XGS devices, this API configures the end-to-end congestion control (E2ECC) message transmit and receive operations. The E2ECC operations are controlled by the BCM_PORT_CONGESTION_CONFIG_E2ECC, _TX, and _RX flags. For example, setting the _E2ECC flag to 1, _TX flag to 1, and _RX flag to 0 enables the E2ECC transmit operation but disables the receive operation. In the bcm_port_congestion_config_t structure, the member port_bits is reserved and should be set to zeroes. The member packets_per_se c controls the refresh rate of E2ECC messages and can range from 40 to 4 million. The refresh rate can also be set to 0, which means an E2ECC message is transmitted only when congestion status changes. The refresh rate is a device-wide parameter, not per port. Hence, the rate will be determined by the most recent call to bcm_port_congestion_config_set in which both the _E2ECC and _TX flags are set, and it will apply to all ports. The members src_port, multicast_id, traffic_class, and color speci fy the HiGig header fields of the E2ECC message. The members src_mac, dest_mac, ethertype, and opcode specify the Ethernet header fields of the E2ECC message.For BCM5645x(katana2) the api is applicable for ge ports as well.

bcm_port_congestion_config_t

packets_per_sec int frequency of sending congestion messages

vlan bcm_vlan_t Vlan

cfi uint8 Canonical Format Indicator (CFI)

dest_mac bcm_mac_t Destination MAC address
ethertype uint16 Ethernet Type
opcode uint16 Opcode

reserved_v uint8 QCN PDU reserved_v

BCM_PORT_CONGESTION_CONFIG_HCFC HCFC format
BCM_PORT_CONGESTION_CONFIG_DESTMOD_FLOW_CONTROL To set, DMVOQ specific configuration
BCM_PORT_CONGESTION_CONFIG_DESTMODPORT_FLOW_CONTROL To set, DPVOQ specific configuration
BCM_PORT_CONGESTION_CONFIG_E2ECC_COE_STRICT_MODE To enable E2ECC FC on COE port in strict mode
BCM_PORT_CONGESTION_CONFIG_E2ECC_COE_FLEX_MODE To enable E2ECC FC on COE port in flex mode

◆ bcm_port_congestion_config_t_init()

void bcm_port_congestion_config_t_init ( bcm_port_congestion_config_t *  config)

Initialize a Port Congestion Configuration structure.

Initializes a port congestion configuration structure to default values. This function should be used to initialize any Port Congestion Configuration structure prior to filling it out and passing it to an API function. This ensures that the structure is initialized to correct default values on subsequent API releases that may add new members to the structure.

Parameters
[in,out]configPointer to Port Congestion Configuration structure to initialize.
Return values
NONE.
