◆ bcm_port_nif_priority_get()

int bcm_port_nif_priority_get ( int  unit,
bcm_gport_t  local_port,
uint32  flags,
bcm_port_nif_prio_t *  priority,
bcm_pbmp_t *  affected_ports 
)

Set/Get port NIF priority.

Set/Get port NIF priority. configuration is per port, however changing one port may have an effect on others, which will be reflacted in affected ports. The structure bcm_port_nif_prio_t is used to describte the attributes of the Priority.

typedef struct bcm_port_nif_prio_s {
int priority_level; // NIF Priority level to set/get
} bcm_port_nif_prio_t;
Parameters
[in]unitUnit number.
[in]local_portlocal port to set\get NIF prio.
[in]flagsflags for function.
[out]priority(INOUT) priority to set.
[out]affected_portsother ports that were affected by this configuration.

◆ bcm_port_nif_priority_set()

int bcm_port_nif_priority_set ( int  unit,
bcm_gport_t  local_port,
uint32  flags,
bcm_port_nif_prio_t *  priority,
bcm_pbmp_t *  affected_ports 
)

Set/Get port NIF priority.

Set/Get port NIF priority. configuration is per port, however changing one port may have an effect on others, which will be reflacted in affected ports. The structure bcm_port_nif_prio_t is used to describte the attributes of the Priority.

typedef struct bcm_port_nif_prio_s {
int priority_level; // NIF Priority level to set/get
} bcm_port_nif_prio_t;
Parameters
[in]unitUnit number.
[in]local_portlocal port to set\get NIF prio.
[in]flagsflags for function.
[in]priority(INOUT) priority to set.
[out]affected_portsother ports that were affected by this configuration.

◆ bcm_port_pause_addr_get()

int bcm_port_pause_addr_get ( int  unit,
bcm_port_t  port,
bcm_mac_t  mac 
)

Get or set the source MAC address transmitted in MAC control pause frames.

MAC control pause frames are transmitted with a well known destination address (01:80:c2:00:00:01) that is not controllable. However, the source address can be set and retrieved using the bcm_port_pause_addr_xxx calls. On switch initialization, the application software should set the pause frame source address for all ports. These values are persistent across calls that enable or disable the transmission of pause frames and need only be set once. Only MAC control pause frames generated by the MACs in the switch device will contain the specified source address. The CPU is able to generate MAC control packets with any source address that will be transmitted unchanged.

Parameters
[in]unitUnit number.
[in]portDevice or logical port number.
[out]macMAC address to transmit as the source address in MAC control pause frames.

◆ bcm_port_pause_addr_set()

int bcm_port_pause_addr_set ( int  unit,
bcm_port_t  port,
bcm_mac_t  mac 
)

Get or set the source MAC address transmitted in MAC control pause frames.

MAC control pause frames are transmitted with a well known destination address (01:80:c2:00:00:01) that is not controllable. However, the source address can be set and retrieved using the bcm_port_pause_addr_xxx calls. On switch initialization, the application software should set the pause frame source address for all ports. These values are persistent across calls that enable or disable the transmission of pause frames and need only be set once. Only MAC control pause frames generated by the MACs in the switch device will contain the specified source address. The CPU is able to generate MAC control packets with any source address that will be transmitted unchanged.

Parameters
[in]unitUnit number.
[in]portDevice or logical port number.
[in]macMAC address to transmit as the source address in MAC control pause frames.

◆ bcm_port_pause_get()

int bcm_port_pause_get ( int  unit,
bcm_port_t  port,
int *  pause_tx,
int *  pause_rx 
)

Enable or disable transmission of pause frames and honoring received pause frames on a port.

Depending on the port type, transmissions of pause frames and honoring received pause frames may be configured independently. If configuring independently (also known as asymmetric flow control) pause_tx and pause_rx need not be the same value. The API call bcm_port_ability_get can be used to determine if asymmetric pause is supported. Symmetric flow control, where both transmission of pause frames and honoring them on reception can be enable or disable by passing 1 or 0 for both pause_tx and pause_rx, respectively. Generally asymmetric flow control is used to limit data flow from end stations toward the device, however if the underlying hardware supports it, bcm_port_pause_set will allow configuring the device for asymmetric flow control in either direction. The current settings of pause-based flow control can be determined using bcm_port_pause_get. Configuration of asymmetric flow control may also be accomplished using the API call bcm_port_pause_sym_set . Code samples demonstrating two methods to configure the same flow control settings can be found in the description of bcm_port_pause_sym_set .

Parameters
[in]unitUnit number.
[in]portDevice port or logical port number
[out]pause_tx0 to disable transmission of pauseframes, 1 to enable.
[out]pause_rx0 to ignore received pause frames, 1 to honor received pause frames.

◆ bcm_port_pause_set()

int bcm_port_pause_set ( int  unit,
bcm_port_t  port,
int  pause_tx,
int  pause_rx 
)

Enable or disable transmission of pause frames and honoring received pause frames on a port.

Depending on the port type, transmissions of pause frames and honoring received pause frames may be configured independently. If configuring independently (also known as asymmetric flow control) pause_tx and pause_rx need not be the same value. The API call bcm_port_ability_get can be used to determine if asymmetric pause is supported. Symmetric flow control, where both transmission of pause frames and honoring them on reception can be enable or disable by passing 1 or 0 for both pause_tx and pause_rx, respectively. Generally asymmetric flow control is used to limit data flow from end stations toward the device, however if the underlying hardware supports it, bcm_port_pause_set will allow configuring the device for asymmetric flow control in either direction. The current settings of pause-based flow control can be determined using bcm_port_pause_get. Configuration of asymmetric flow control may also be accomplished using the API call bcm_port_pause_sym_set . Code samples demonstrating two methods to configure the same flow control settings can be found in the description of bcm_port_pause_sym_set .

Parameters
[in]unitUnit number.
[in]portDevice port or logical port number
[in]pause_tx0 to disable transmission of pauseframes, 1 to enable.
[in]pause_rx0 to ignore received pause frames, 1 to honor received pause frames.

◆ bcm_port_pause_sym_get()

int bcm_port_pause_sym_get ( int  unit,
bcm_port_t  port,
int *  pause 
)

Configure or retrieve asymmetric pause setting for a port.

For complete description, see bcm_port_pause_set . bcm_port_pause_sym set functionality can also be accomplished using bcm_port_pause_set and shown as follows:

// The following two API calls are functionally equivalent and configure a port to transmit and honor pause frames
rv = bcm_port_pause_set(unit, port, 1, 1);
rv = bcm_port_pause_sym_set(unit, port, BCM_PORT_PAUSE_SYM);
// The following two API calls are functionally equivalent and configure a port to transmit pause frames, but ignore received pause frames.
rv = bcm_port_pause_set(unit, port, 1, 0);
rv = bcm_port_pause_sym_set(unit, port, BCM_PORT_PAUSE_TX);
// The following two API calls are functionally equivalent and configure a port to honor received pause frames, and not transmit them.
rv = bcm_port_pause_set(unit, port, 0, 1);
rv = bcm_port_pause_sym_set(unit, port, BCM_PORT_PAUSE_RX);
// The following two API calls are functionally equivalent and configure a port to ignore received pause frames, and not transmit them.
rv = bcm_port_pause_set(unit, port, 0, 1);
rv = bcm_port_pause_sym_set(unit, port, BCM_PORT_PAUSE_RX);
Parameters
[in]unitUnit number.
[in]portDevice or logical port number
[out]pauseRequested or current pause settings, one of BCM_PORT_PAUSE_SYM for symmetric pause, BCM_PORT_PAUSE_ASYM_RX for asymmetric pause to honor received MAC control pause frames but not transmit, BCM_PORT_PAUSE_ASYM_TX to ignore received pause frames but transmit, and BCM_PORT_PAUSE_NONE to neither honor or transmit pause frames.

◆ bcm_port_pause_sym_set()

int bcm_port_pause_sym_set ( int  unit,
bcm_port_t  port,
int  pause 
)

Configure or retrieve asymmetric pause setting for a port.

For complete description, see bcm_port_pause_set . bcm_port_pause_sym set functionality can also be accomplished using bcm_port_pause_set and shown as follows:

// The following two API calls are functionally equivalent and configure a port to transmit and honor pause frames
rv = bcm_port_pause_set(unit, port, 1, 1);
rv = bcm_port_pause_sym_set(unit, port, BCM_PORT_PAUSE_SYM);
// The following two API calls are functionally equivalent and configure a port to transmit pause frames, but ignore received pause frames.
rv = bcm_port_pause_set(unit, port, 1, 0);
rv = bcm_port_pause_sym_set(unit, port, BCM_PORT_PAUSE_TX);
// The following two API calls are functionally equivalent and configure a port to honor received pause frames, and not transmit them.
rv = bcm_port_pause_set(unit, port, 0, 1);
rv = bcm_port_pause_sym_set(unit, port, BCM_PORT_PAUSE_RX);
// The following two API calls are functionally equivalent and configure a port to ignore received pause frames, and not transmit them.
rv = bcm_port_pause_set(unit, port, 0, 1);
rv = bcm_port_pause_sym_set(unit, port, BCM_PORT_PAUSE_RX);
Parameters
[in]unitUnit number.
[in]portDevice or logical port number
[in]pauseRequested or current pause settings, one of BCM_PORT_PAUSE_SYM for symmetric pause, BCM_PORT_PAUSE_ASYM_RX for asymmetric pause to honor received MAC control pause frames but not transmit, BCM_PORT_PAUSE_ASYM_TX to ignore received pause frames but transmit, and BCM_PORT_PAUSE_NONE to neither honor or transmit pause frames.

◆ bcm_port_pcs_lane_map_set()

int bcm_port_pcs_lane_map_set ( int  unit,
bcm_port_t  port,
uint32  flags,
int  num_map,
bcm_port_lane_to_serdes_map_t *  serdes_map 
)

Configure PCS lane map for the entire PM.

The API receives all lanes configuration for the PM at once. Location in the array represent the lane number (e.g. serdes_map[x] holds the information for lane=x).

Parameters
[in]unitUnit number.
[in]port
[in]flags
[in]num_map
[in]serdes_map

◆ bcm_port_pfm_get()

int bcm_port_pfm_get ( int  unit,
bcm_port_t  port,
int *  mode 
)

Set or retrieve the current unknown multicast behavior.

A port value of -1 or gport type for system configuration will configure all ports. Unknown layer 2 multicast addresses recognized on an ingress port may be treated differently depending on the port filtering mode (or pfm). The supported modes of operation are:

Port Filtering Modes
Filtering Mode Meaning
BCM_PORT_MCAST_FLOOD_ALL Flood all multicast packets to the VLAN
BCM_PORT_MCAST_FLOOD_UNKNOWN Flood unknown multicast packets to the VLAN
BCM_PORT_MCAST_FLOOD_NONE Forward multicast packets with known destination addresses to the appropriate ports. All packets destined to an unknown multicast address are dropped.
Parameters
[in]unitUnit number.
[in]portDevice or logical port number or -1 to setup all ports.
[out]modePort filtering mode, see table BCM_PORT_PFM_table

◆ bcm_port_pfm_set()

int bcm_port_pfm_set ( int  unit,
bcm_port_t  port,
int  mode 
)

Set or retrieve the current unknown multicast behavior.

A port value of -1 or gport type for system configuration will configure all ports. Unknown layer 2 multicast addresses recognized on an ingress port may be treated differently depending on the port filtering mode (or pfm). The supported modes of operation are:

Port Filtering Modes
Filtering Mode Meaning
BCM_PORT_MCAST_FLOOD_ALL Flood all multicast packets to the VLAN
BCM_PORT_MCAST_FLOOD_UNKNOWN Flood unknown multicast packets to the VLAN
BCM_PORT_MCAST_FLOOD_NONE Forward multicast packets with known destination addresses to the appropriate ports. All packets destined to an unknown multicast address are dropped.
Parameters
[in]unitUnit number.
[in]portDevice or logical port number or -1 to setup all ports.
[in]modePort filtering mode, see table BCM_PORT_PFM_table

◆ bcm_port_phy_control_get()

int bcm_port_phy_control_get ( int  unit,
bcm_port_t  port,
bcm_port_phy_control_t  type,
uint32 *  value 
)

Set/Get PHY specific configurations.

Set or get PHY specific configurations. All configurations enumerated in bcm_port_phy_control_t may not be available on a PHY. The configuration types shown in PORT_PHY_v .

bcm_port_phy_control_t
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_WAN Enable/Disable WAN mode. If WAN mode is enabled, LAN mode is disabled and vice versa. Default configuration is LAN mode.
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PREEMPHASIS Configure preemphasis of the PHY.
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PREEMPHASIS_LANE0 Configure preemphasis of the PHY device's lane0.
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PREEMPHASIS_LANE1 Configure preemphasis of the PHY device's lane1.
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PREEMPHASIS_LANE2 Configure preemphasis of the PHY device's lane2.
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PREEMPHASIS_LANE3 Configure preemphasis of the PHY device's lane3.
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_DRIVER_CURRENT Configure driver current of the PHY.
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_DRIVER_CURRENT_LANE0 Configure driver current of the PHY device's lane0.
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_DRIVER_CURRENT_LANE1 Configure driver current of the PHY device's lane1.
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_DRIVER_CURRENT_LANE2 Configure driver current of the PHY device's lane2.
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_DRIVER_CURRENT_LANE3 Configure driver current of the PHY device's lane3.
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PRE_DRIVER_CURRENT Configure pre-driver current of the PHY.
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PRE_DRIVER_CURRENT_LANE0 Configure pre-driver current of the PHY device's lane0.
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PRE_DRIVER_CURRENT_LANE1 Configure pre-driver current of the PHY device's lane1.
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PRE_DRIVER_CURRENT_LANE2 Configure pre-driver current of the PHY device's lane2.
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PRE_DRIVER_CURRENT_LANE3 Configure pre-driver current of the PHY device's lane3.
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_INTERFACE Select the active logical interface in the multiplex PHY device.
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_MACSEC_SWITCH_FIXED Switch MAC policy to determine speed, duplex and Pause settings
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_MACSEC_SWITCH_FIXED_SPEED Switch MAC Speed setting for Switch fixed policy
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_MACSEC_SWITCH_FIXED_DUPLEX Switch MAC Duplex setting for Switch fixed policy
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_MACSEC_SWITCH_FIXED_PAUSE Switch MAC Pause setting for Switch fixed policy
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_MACSEC_PAUSE_RX_FORWARD RX Pause settings for MACSec PHY
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_MACSEC_PAUSE_TX_FORWARD TX Pause settings for MACSec PHY
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_MACSEC_LINE_IPG Line MAC IPG setting in MACSec PHY
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_MACSEC_SWITCH_IPG Switch MAC IPG setting in MACSec PHY
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_LONGREACH_SPEED Forced speed setting in the LONGREACH mode
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_LONGREACH_PAIRS Forced number of pairs in the LONGREACH mode
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_LONGREACH_GAIN Forced gain in the LONGREACH mode
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_LONGREACH_AUTONEG LDS auto-negotiation in the LONGREACH mode
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_LONGREACH_LOCAL_ABILITY Local LDS advertisement
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_LONGREACH_REMOTE_ABILITY Remote LDS advertisement (Read Only)
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_LONGREACH_CURRENT_ABILITY Mode selected by LDS (Read Only)
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_LONGREACH_MASTER Master phy in the absence of LDS (0=slave, 1=master else undefined)
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_LONGREACH_ACTIVE Longreach mode is active (Read Only)
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_LONGREACH_ENABLE Longreach capability is enabled
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_POWER Switch between low power mode and full power mode
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_LOOPBACK_EXTERNAL Enable / Disable loopback mode with an external RJ-45 plug (at 1G)
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_LINKDOWN_TRANSMIT Enable / Disable port and MAC for transmit during link down
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_CLOCK_ENABLE Enable / Disable RX clock extraction from the port
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_CLOCK_SECONDARY_ENABLE Enable / Disable backup RX clock extraction from the port
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_CLOCK_FREQUENCY Set / Get extracted or input clock frequency (in KHz)
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_CLOCK_MODE_AUTO Automatically disable the clock when link goes down.
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_CLOCK_AUTO_SECONDARY Automatic switch primary recovery clock to secondary source when link failure.
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_CLOCK_SOURCE Get the source of primary recovered clock at present. The returned values were defined in table BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_CLOCK_SOURCE_value
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PORT_PRIMARY Switch port corresponding to the first PHY port of the PHY chip (multi-phy chips only)
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PORT_OFFSET The offset of the switch port's PHY port from the primary PHY port (multi-phy chips only)
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_EDC_CONFIG Automatically configure EDC mode through either software or hardware
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_EDC_MODE Set/Get the EDC mode
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_SUPER_ISOLATE Turn on Super Isolate mode on PHY device
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_SOFT_RESET Issue Soft-Reset to clear all PHY registers
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_EEE Enable / Disable EEE (Native) in the PHY
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_EEE_AUTO Enable / Disable (AutogrEEEn) EEE Auto in the PHY
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_EEE_AUTO_IDLE_THRESHOLD Configure IDLE threshold limit for LPI state transitions in AutogrEEEn Mode
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_EEE_AUTO_BUFFER_LIMIT Configure Buffer size for buffering IDLE/Data in AutogrEEEn Mode
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_EEE_AUTO_FIXED_LATENCY Configure Fixed Latency or Variable Latency for AutogrEEEn Mode
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_EEE_TRANSMIT_WAKE_TIME Configure WAKE time for the PHY
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_EEE_TRANSMIT_SLEEP_TIME Configure Transmit SLEEP time for the PHY
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_EEE_RECEIVE_SLEEP_TIME Configure Receive SLEEP time for the PHY
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_EEE_TRANSMIT_QUIET_TIME Configure transmit QUIET time for the PHY
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_EEE_RECEIVE_QUIET_TIME Configure Receive QUIET time for the PHY
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_EEE_TRANSMIT_REFRESH_TIME Configure Transmit REFRESH time for the PHY
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_EEE_TRANSMIT_EVENTS Transmit side events count of IDLE to LPI transition
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_EEE_TRANSMIT_DURATION Total Duration count of Transmit side in LPI state
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_EEE_RECEIVE_EVENTS Receive side events count of IDLE to LPI transition
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_EEE_RECEIVE_DURATION Total Duration count of Receive side in LPI state
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_EEE_STATISTICS_CLEAR Clear EEE statistics
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PON_LASER_TX_POWER_TIME Laser Transmit power shut down duration
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PON_LASER_TX_POWER_MODE Laser Transmit power mode (value 0: active PON, value 1: standby PON, value 2: both)
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PON_LASER_TX_STATUS Laser Transmit status (value 0: normal state, value 1: always on, value 2: disable)
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PON_LASER_RX_STATE Laser Receive status (value 0: optical los, value 1: optical unlock, value 2: optical lock)
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PON_LASER_TRANCEIVER_TEMP Transceiver temperature
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PON_LASER_SUPPLY_VOLTAGE Transceiver supply voltage
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PON_LASER_TX_BIAS Transceiver Transmit supply voltage
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PON_LASER_TX_POWER Transceiver Transmit power
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PON_LASER_RX_POWER Transceiver Receive power
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PON_RX_POWER_HIGH_ALARM_STATE Transceiver Receive power high alarm state
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PON_RX_POWER_HIGH_ALARM_REPORT_THRESHOLD Transceiver Receive power high alarm report threshold
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PON_RX_POWER_HIGH_ALARM_CLEAR_THRESHOLD Transceiver Receive power high alarm clear threshold
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PON_RX_POWER_LOW_ALARM_STATE Transceiver Receive power low alarm state
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PON_RX_POWER_LOW_ALARM_REPORT_THRESHOLD Transceiver Receive power low alarm report threshold
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PON_RX_POWER_LOW_ALARM_CLEAR_THRESHOLD Transceiver Receive power low alarm clear threshold
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PON_TX_POWER_HIGH_ALARM_STATE Transceiver Transmit power high alarm state
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PON_TX_POWER_HIGH_ALARM_REPORT_THRESHOLD Transceiver Transmit power high alarm report threshold
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PON_TX_POWER_HIGH_ALARM_CLEAR_THRESHOLD Transceiver Transmit power high alarm clear threshold
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PON_TX_POWER_LOW_ALARM_STATE Transceiver Transmit power low alarm state
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PON_TX_POWER_LOW_ALARM_REPORT_THRESHOLD Transceiver Transmit power low alarm report threshold
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PON_TX_POWER_LOW_ALARM_CLEAR_THRESHOLD Transceiver Transmit power low alarm clear threshold
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PON_TX_BIAS_HIGH_ALARM_STATE Transceiver Transmit bias high alarm state
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PON_TX_BIAS_HIGH_ALARM_REPORT_THRESHOLD Transceiver Transmit bias high alarm report threshold
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PON_TX_BIAS_HIGH_ALARM_CLEAR_THRESHOLD Transceiver Transmit bias high alarm clear threshold
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PON_TX_BIAS_LOW_ALARM_STATE Transceiver Transmit bias low alarm state
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PON_TX_BIAS_LOW_ALARM_REPORT_THRESHOLD Transceiver Transmit bias low alarm report threshold
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PON_TX_BIAS_LOW_ALARM_CLEAR_THRESHOLD Transceiver Transmit bias low alarm clear threshold
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PON_VCC_HIGH_ALARM_STATE Transceiver supply voltage high alarm state
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PON_VCC_HIGH_ALARM_REPORT_THRESHOLD Transceiver supply voltage high alarm report threshold
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PON_VCC_HIGH_ALARM_CLEAR_THRESHOLD Transceiver supply voltage high alarm clear threshold
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PON_VCC_LOW_ALARM_STATE Transceiver supply voltage low alarm state
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PON_VCC_LOW_ALARM_REPORT_THRESHOLD Transceiver supply voltage low alarm report threshold
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PON_VCC_LOW_ALARM_CLEAR_THRESHOLD Transceiver supply voltage low alarm clear threshold
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PON_TEMP_HIGH_ALARM_STATE Transceiver temperature high alarm state
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PON_TEMP_HIGH_ALARM_REPORT_THRESHOLD Transceiver temperature high alarm report threshold
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PON_TEMP_HIGH_ALARM_CLEAR_THRESHOLD Transceiver temperature high alarm clear threshold
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PON_TEMP_LOW_ALARM_STATE Transceiver temperature low alarm state
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PON_TEMP_LOW_ALARM_REPORT_THRESHOLD Transceiver temperature low alarm report threshold
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PON_TEMP_LOW_ALARM_CLEAR_THRESHOLD Transceiver temperature low alarm clear threshold
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PON_RX_POWER_HIGH_WARNING_STATE Transceiver Receive power high warning alarm state
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PON_RX_POWER_HIGH_WARNING_REPORT_THRESHOLD Transceiver Receive power high warning alarm report threshold
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PON_RX_POWER_HIGH_WARNING_CLEAR_THRESHOLD Transceiver Receive power high warning alarm clear threshold
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PON_RX_POWER_LOW_WARNING_STATE Transceiver Receive power low warning alarm state
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PON_RX_POWER_LOW_WARNING_REPORT_THRESHOLD Transceiver Receive power low warning alarm report threshold
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PON_RX_POWER_LOW_WARNING_CLEAR_THRESHOLD Transceiver Receive power low warning alarm clear threshold
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PON_TX_POWER_HIGH_WARNING_STATE Transceiver Transmit power high warning alarm state
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PON_TX_POWER_HIGH_WARNING_REPORT_THRESHOLD Transceiver Transmit power high warning alarm report threshold
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PON_TX_POWER_HIGH_WARNING_CLEAR_THRESHOLD Transceiver Transmit power high warning alarm clear threshold
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PON_TX_POWER_LOW_WARNING_STATE Transceiver Transmit power low warning alarm state
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PON_TX_POWER_LOW_WARNING_REPORT_THRESHOLD Transceiver Transmit power low warning alarm report threshold
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PON_TX_POWER_LOW_WARNING_CLEAR_THRESHOLD Transceiver Transmit power low warning alarm clear threshold
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PON_TX_BIAS_HIGH_WARNING_STATE Transceiver Transmit bias high warning alarm state
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PON_TX_BIAS_HIGH_WARNING_REPORT_THRESHOLD Transceiver Transmit bias high warning alarm report threshold
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PON_TX_BIAS_HIGH_WARNING_CLEAR_THRESHOLD Transceiver Transmit bias high warning alarm clear threshold
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PON_TX_BIAS_LOW_WARNING_STATE Transceiver Transmit bias low warning alarm state
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PON_TX_BIAS_LOW_WARNING_REPORT_THRESHOLD Transceiver Transmit bias low warning alarm report threshold
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PON_TX_BIAS_LOW_WARNING_CLEAR_THRESHOLD Transceiver Transmit bias low warning alarm clear threshold
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PON_VCC_HIGH_WARNING_STATE Transceiver supply voltage high warning alarm state
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PON_VCC_HIGH_WARNING_REPORT_THRESHOLD Transceiver supply voltage high warning alarm report threshold
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PON_VCC_HIGH_WARNING_CLEAR_THRESHOLD Transceiver supply voltage high warning alarm clear threshold
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PON_VCC_LOW_WARNING_STATE Transceiver supply voltage low warning alarm state
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PON_VCC_LOW_WARNING_REPORT_THRESHOLD Transceiver supply voltage low warning alarm report threshold
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PON_VCC_LOW_WARNING_CLEAR_THRESHOLD Transceiver supply voltage low warning alarm clear threshold
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PON_TEMP_HIGH_WARNING_STATE Transceiver temperature high warning alarm state
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PON_TEMP_HIGH_WARNING_REPORT_THRESHOLD Transceiver temperature high warning alarm report threshold
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PON_TEMP_HIGH_WARNING_CLEAR_THRESHOLD Transceiver temperature high warning alarm clear threshold
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PON_TEMP_LOW_WARNING_STATE Transceiver temperature low warning alarm state
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PON_TEMP_LOW_WARNING_REPORT_THRESHOLD Transceiver temperature low warning alarm report threshold
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PON_TEMP_LOW_WARNING_CLEAR_THRESHOLD Transceiver temperature low warning alarm clear threshold
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_DLL_POWER_AUTO Enable / Disable DLL auto power down
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_TX_LANE_SQUELCH Suppress Serdes TX without link powerdown. No reset needed to restart TX.
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_RX_LANE_SQUELCH Suppress Serdes RX incoming signals without cable unplugged or plugged.
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_DRIVER_POST2_CURRENT Second post cursor TAP.
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_RX_PPM Print PPM offset tracked by RX (After 2's complement and divide by 83.89)
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_RX_POLARITY RX polarity value
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_TX_POLARITY TX polarity value
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_RX_RESET SerDes RX reset
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_TX_RESET SerDes TX reset
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_CL72 Enable/Disable Clause 72
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_CL72_STATUS Print Cl72 status
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_RX_LOW_FREQ_PEAK_FILTER Print DSC tuned Low Freq Peaking Filter
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_FIRMWARE_MODE set the SerDes microcontroller mode
BCM_PORT_PHY_FIRMWARE_DEFAULT SerDes default microcontroller mode
BCM_PORT_PHY_FIRMWARE_SFP_OPT_SR4 SerDes microcontroller mode for optical short range
BCM_PORT_PHY_FIRMWARE_SFP_DAC SerDes microcontroller mode for direct attach copper
BCM_PORT_PHY_FIRMWARE_XLAUI SerDes microcontroller mode for 40G XLAUI mode
BCM_PORT_PHY_FIRMWARE_FORCE_OSDFE SerDes microcontroller mode for force over sample DFE
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_FIRMWARE_DFE_ENABLE SerDes microcontroller mode to enable DFE
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_FIRMWARE_LP_DFE_ENABLE SerDes microcontroller mode to enable low power DFE
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_FIRMWARE_BR_DFE_ENABLE SerDes microcontroller mode to enable digital feedback equalization
BCM_PORT_PHY_FIRMWARE_FORCE_BRDFE SerDes microcontroller mode for force baud rate DFE
BCM_PORT_PHY_FIRMWARE_SW_CL72 SerDes microcontroller mode for software cl72 with AN on
BCM_PORT_PHY_FIRMWARE_CL72_WITHOUT_AN SerDes microcontroller mode for cl72 without AN
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_DFE Set SerDes microcontroller DFE mode
BCM_PORT_PHY_DFE_AUTO SerDes microcontroller FIRMWARE controls DFE adjustment
BCM_PORT_PHY_DFE_FREEZE SerDes microcontroller DFE freeze to current values
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_RX_PEAK_FILTER Print DSC tuned Peaking Filter
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_RX_VGA 6 bit RX VGA value
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_RX_TAP1 6 bit RX DFE TAP1 value
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_RX_TAP2 6 bit RX DFE TAP2 value
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_RX_TAP3 6 bit RX DFE TAP3 value
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_RX_TAP4 6 bit RX DFE TAP4 value
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_RX_TAP5 6 bit RX DFE TAP5 value
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_RX_TAP6 6 bit RX DFE TAP6 value
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_RX_PLUS1_SLICER Even and Odd P Calibration for slicer
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_RX_MINUS1_SLICER Even and Odd M Calibration for slicer
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_RX_D_SLICER Even and Odd D Calibration for slicer
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_RX_SIGNAL_DETECT Signal Detect on link.
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_RX_SEQ_DONE RX Sequencer Done (implies CDR done too)
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_SCRAMBLER Scrambler enable/disable
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_TX_PATTERN_20BIT 20 bit tx pattern
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_TX_PATTERN_256BIT 256 bit tx pattern
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_TX_PATTERN_DATA0 256 bit tx pattern word 0
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_TX_PATTERN_DATA1 256 bit tx pattern word 1
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_TX_PATTERN_DATA2 256 bit tx pattern word 2
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_TX_PATTERN_DATA3 256 bit tx pattern word 3
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_TX_PATTERN_DATA4 256 bit tx pattern word 4
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_TX_PATTERN_DATA5 256 bit tx pattern word 5
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_TX_PATTERN_DATA6 256 bit tx pattern word 6
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_TX_PATTERN_DATA7 256 bit tx pattern word 7
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PHASE_INTERP Sync TX interpolator with any RX interpolator
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_EYE_VERTICAL_UP Vertical Up for Eye margin msmt
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_EYE_VERTICAL_DOWN Vertical Down for Eye margin msmt
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_EYE_HORIZONTAL_LEFT Horizontal left for Eye margin msmt
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_EYE_HORIZONTAL_RIGHT Horizontal Right for Eye margin msmt
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_EYE_LIVE_LINK Live link eye margin msmt or link down.
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_EYE_BER Threshold Bit Error Rate for eye msmt
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_EYE_TOL Tolerance for eye msmt
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_EYE_ENABLE Enable eye margin msmt code (after setting all other EYE parameters)
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_TX_PPM_ADJUST Adjust Tx phase interpolator(PI) frequency (enables Tx PI)
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_SOFTWARE_RX_LOS Enable Software/Firmware Rx Los Feature
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_SOFTWARE_RX_LOS_LINK_WAIT_TIMER_US Configure RX_LOS_LINK_WAIT_TIMER value in us.
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_SOFTWARE_RX_LOS_RESTART_TIMER_US Configire RX_LOS_RESTART_TIMER value in us.
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_CL73_FSM_AUTO_RECOVER Enable CL73 FSM(finite state machine) auto recovery feature
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_RX_PEAK_FILTER_TEMP_COMP Enable receiver's peaking filter temperature compensation feature
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_DRIVER_SUPPLY Configure the tx driver power supply
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_DRIVER_SUPPLY_1_5V_1_0V Specify 1.5V supply, 1.0V peak-to-peak drive
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_DRIVER_SUPPLY_1_0V_700MV Specify 1.0V supply, 700MV peak-to-peak drive
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_DRIVER_SUPPLY_1_5V_700MV Specify 1.5V supply, 700MV peak-to-peak drive
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_DIGITAL_TEMP Returns the internally derived temperature (celsius degree) of the die for the digital section
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_ANALOG_TEMP Returns the internally derived temperature (celsius degree) of the die for the analog section
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_MGBASET_802P3BZ_PRIORITY Specify MGBASE-T Broadcom or IEEE 802.3bz 5GBase-T & 2.5GBase-T mode
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_AUTONEG_MODE Set autoneg mode. Different autoneg modes supported defined in table BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_AUTONEG_mode .It is required to disable autoneg before setting the autoneg mode. Autoneg can be enabled after setting the autoneg mode.
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PARALLEL_DETECTION Enable/Disable 1G Parallel detect (1-enable/0-disable)
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PARALLEL_DETECTION_10G Enable/Disable 10G Parallel detect (1-enable/0-disable)
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_HG2_BCM_CODEC_ENABLE Enable/Disable hg2 codec (1-enable/0-disable)
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PRBS_RX_INVERT_DATA Invert PRBS Rx Data
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PRBS_CHECK_MODE GET/SET Prbs mode 0 - self-sync mode w/ hysteresis, counts bit errors 1 - self-sync mode w/ hysteresis, counts error events 2 - initial seed mode w/ hysteresis, counts bit errors 3 - initial seed mode w/ hysteresis, counts error events 4 - initial seed mode w/o hysteresis, counts bit errors, needs re-lock command 5 - initial seed mode w/o hysteresis, counts error events, needs re-lock command
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_MOD_AUTO_DETECT_ENABLE Enable/Disable module auto detection feature (1-enable/0-disable)
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_INTR_MASK Set/get interrupt mask for interrupts sent through external PHY interrupt pin. Each bit represents a separate interrupt source.
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_INTR_STATUS Get interrupt status for interrupts sent through external PHY interrupt pin. Each bit represents a separate interrupt source. Use set function to clear interrupt status.
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_XSW_LANE_MAP Cross-switch lane map. Bits[3:0] map Rx lane 0, bits [7:4] map Rx lane 1, etc. Default mapping is 0x76543210.
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_GPIO_CONFIG The 32-bit control value is divided into eight 4-bit configuration values. Bits [3:0] controls GPIO pin 0, bits [7:4] controls GPIO pin 1, etc The configuration value may be on of the following: BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_GPIO_CONFIG_DISABLED (0) BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_GPIO_CONFIG_OUTPUT (1) BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_GPIO_CONFIG_INPUT (2) For example, in order to configure GPIO pins 0 and 1 as output and GPIO pins 2 and 3 as input, then the following value must be supplied: 0x00002211
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_GPIO_VALUE The 32-bit control value is divided into eight 4-bit pin values. Bits [3:0] is the value of GPIO pin 0, bits [7:4] is the value of GPIO pin 1, etc. Pin value must be either 0 or 1. New pin values are only applied to pins configured as output pins. For example, in order to set output GPIO pins 0 and 1 to 0 and 1 respectively, then the following value must be supplied: 0x00000010 If input GPIO pins 2 and 3 are both 1, then the PHY control value returned by the API will be: 0x00001100
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PCS_MODE The 32-bit control value represents different PCS modes defined in table BCM_PORT_PHY_PCS_modes .
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_AUTONEG_ALLOW_PLL_CHANGE value of 1 allow PLL to change during AN, otherwise no pll change is allowed .
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_FAIL_OVER_MODE value of 1 enable fail over mode on the port, otherwise normal mode is used.
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_SHORT_CHANNEL_MODE value of 1 enable short channel mode on the port, otherwise normal mode is used.
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_SHORT_CHANNEL_MODE_STATUS prints the short channel mode status of the port
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_EYE_VAL_HZ_L Eye margin estimate on horizontal left
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_EYE_VAL_HZ_R Eye margin estimate on horizontal right
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_EYE_VAL_VT_U Eye margin estimate on vertical up
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_EYE_VAL_VT_D Eye margin estimate on vertical down
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_MEDIUM_TYPE The 32-bit control value represents different medium types. The configuration value may be on of the following: BCM_PORT_MEDIUM_NONE (0) BCM_PORT_MEDIUM_COPPER (1) BCM_PORT_MEDIUM_FIBER (2).
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_FORWARD_ERROR_CORRECTION_CL91 FEC cl91 on/off for tscf
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_UNRELIABLE_LOS Configuration of "unreliable_los" bit.
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_FIRMWARE_CL72_RESTART_TIMEOUT_ENABLE enable cl72 restart timeout on the firmware
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_FIRMWARE_CL72_AUTO_POLARITY_ENABLE enable cl72 auto polarity on the firmware
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_FIRMWARE_AN_CL72_TX_INIT_SKIP_ON_RESTART skip the TXFIR initialization in a restart event during the AN link training
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_TX_FIR_DRIVERMODE configure the TX drivermode
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_FORCED_SPEED_LINE_SIDE Set speed on line side of external PHY in case of EBE mode
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_EGRESS_FLOW_CONTROL_MODE Supported flow modes are defined in in table BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_FLOW_CONTROL_MODE_value
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_INGRESS_FLOW_CONTROL_MODE Supported flow modes are defined in in table BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_FLOW_CONTROL_MODE_value
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PSM_COS_BMP Set COS bit map for PSM (Packet Storage Modude) of an external PHY in EBE/EtherRAM mode. Valid range of values are 0x1:0x1FF
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_AUTONEG_LINE_SIDE Valid in case of EBE mode of MT2 PHY device and can be applied only to enable Autoneg only on line side of MT2 ports. For all other cases, the function will return "BCM_E_UNAVAIL" to indicate the functionality unavailable.
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_FEC_CORRECTED_BLOCK_COUNT Get CL74 FEC corrected block count
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_FEC_UNCORRECTED_BLOCK_COUNT Get CL74 FEC uncorrected block count
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_FEC_CORRECTED_CODEWORD_COUNT Get RS FEC corrected codeword count
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_FEC_UNCORRECTED_CODEWORD_COUNT Get RS FEC uncorrected codeword count
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_TX_PAM4_PRECODER_ENABLE set(get) PAM4 mode tx precoder enable
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_LP_TX_PRECODER_ENABLE set(get) PAM4 mode link partner tx precoder enable
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_FAST_BER_PROJ get port bit error rate projection based on prbs data
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_LINK_TRAINING_INIT_TX_FIR_POST set the tx fir post initial value for link training

bcm_port_phy_clock_source_t
Value Description
bcmPortPhyClockSourcePrimary Recovery clock is being derived from primary port's recovered clock
bcmPortPhyClockSourceSecondary Recovery clock is being derived from the secondary port's recovered clock

RX_LOS Values
Value Meaning
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_RX_LOS_NONE Specify to Disable Software/Firmware Rx Los Feature
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_RX_LOS_SOFTWARE Specify to Enable Software Rx Los Feature
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_RX_LOS_FIRMWARE Specify to Enable Firmware Rx Los Feature

Flow Control Modes
Value Meaning
bcmPortPhyControlFlowCtrlModeNone Relay Mode or No flow control mode enabled
bcmPortPhyControlFlowCtrlLegacyPauseEn Lagacy Pause flow control mode
bcmPortPhyControlFlowCtrlPfcPause PFC flow control mode
bcmPortPhyControlFlowCtrlLlfc LLFC flow control mode

GPIO_CONFIG Values
Value Meaning
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_GPIO_CONFIG_DISABLED To disable GPIO pin
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_GPIO_CONFIG_OUTPUT To configure GPIO pin as output
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_GPIO_CONFIG_INPUT To configure GPIO pin as input

Longreach Ability Bitmap Values
Flag Meaning
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_LONGREACH_ABILITY_NONE No ability
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_LONGREACH_ABILITY_10M_1PAIR 10 Mbps over 1 pair
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_LONGREACH_ABILITY_10M_2PAIR 10 Mbps over 2 pairs
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_LONGREACH_ABILITY_20M_1PAIR 20 Mbps over 1 pair
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_LONGREACH_ABILITY_20M_2PAIR 20 Mbps over 2 pairs
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_LONGREACH_ABILITY_25M_1PAIR 25 Mbps over 1 pair
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_LONGREACH_ABILITY_25M_2PAIR 25 Mbps over 2 pairs
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_LONGREACH_ABILITY_33M_1PAIR 33 Mbps over 1 pair
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_LONGREACH_ABILITY_33M_2PAIR 33 Mbps over 2 pairs
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_LONGREACH_ABILITY_50M_1PAIR 50 Mbps over 1 pair
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_LONGREACH_ABILITY_50M_2PAIR 50 Mbps over 2 pairs
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_LONGREACH_ABILITY_100M_1PAIR 100 Mbps over 1 pair
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_LONGREACH_ABILITY_100M_2PAIR 100 Mbps over 2 pairs
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_LONGREACH_ABILITY_100M_4PAIR 100 Mbps over 4 pairs
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_LONGREACH_ABILITY_PAUSE_RX RX Pause
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_LONGREACH_ABILITY_PAUSE_TX TX Pause

Power Control Values
Flag Meaning
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_POWER_FULL full power mode
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_POWER_LOW low power mode
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_POWER_AUTO Enable auto power down mode
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_POWER_AUTO_DISABLE Disable auto power down mode
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_POWER_AUTO_FULL Enable auto power down mode with high power setting
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_POWER_AUTO_LOW Enable auto power down mode with low power setting

EDC Config Values
Value Meaning
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_EDC_CONFIG_NONE No EDC auto configuration by hardware
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_EDC_CONFIG_HARDWARE EDC auto configuration by hardware
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_EDC_CONFIG_SOFTWARE EDC auto configuration by software

Autoneg modes
Flag Meaning
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_AUTONEG_MODE_CL37 Clause 37 autoneg mode
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_AUTONEG_MODE_CL37_BAM Clause 37 BAM autoneg mode
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_AUTONEG_MODE_CL73 Clause 73 autoneg mode
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_AUTONEG_MODE_CL73_BAM Clause 73 BAM autoneg mode
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_AUTONEG_MODE_CL37_CL73 Clause 37 & Clause 73 autoneg mode
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_AUTONEG_MODE_CL37_CL73_BAM Clause 37 & Clause 73 BAM autoneg mode
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_AUTONEG_MODE_CL37_BAM_CL73 Clause 37 BAM & Clause 73 autoneg mode
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_AUTONEG_MODE_CL37_BAM_CL73_BAM Clause 37 BAM & Clause 73 BAM autoneg mode
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_AUTONEG_FEC_OVERRIDE Clause 73 autoneg mode for 100G noFEC

TX drivermode
Value Meaning
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_TX_FIR_DRIVERMODE_DEFAULT default drivermode
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_TX_FIR_DRIVERMODE_NOT_SUPPORTED not supported drivermode
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_TX_FIR_DRIVERMODE_HALF_AMP half amp mode
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_TX_FIR_DRIVERMODE_HALF_AMP_HI_IMPED high impedance half amp mode

HG2 codec mode
Value Meaning
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_HG2_BCM_CODEC_ENABLE_OFF hg2 codec off
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_HG2_BCM_CODEC_ENABLE_ON_WITH_8BYTE_IPG 8-byte IPG setting
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_HG2_BCM_CODEC_ENABLE_ON_WITH_9BYTE_IPG 9-byte IPG setting
Parameters
[in]unitUnit number.
[in]portDevice or logical port number
[in]typeType of configuration to update
[out]value(for "_set") Value of the configuration
(for "_get", OUT) Value of the configuration

◆ bcm_port_phy_control_set()

int bcm_port_phy_control_set ( int  unit,
bcm_port_t  port,
bcm_port_phy_control_t  type,
uint32  value 
)

Set/Get PHY specific configurations.

Set or get PHY specific configurations. All configurations enumerated in bcm_port_phy_control_t may not be available on a PHY. The configuration types shown in PORT_PHY_v .

bcm_port_phy_control_t
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_WAN Enable/Disable WAN mode. If WAN mode is enabled, LAN mode is disabled and vice versa. Default configuration is LAN mode.
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PREEMPHASIS Configure preemphasis of the PHY.
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PREEMPHASIS_LANE0 Configure preemphasis of the PHY device's lane0.
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PREEMPHASIS_LANE1 Configure preemphasis of the PHY device's lane1.
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PREEMPHASIS_LANE2 Configure preemphasis of the PHY device's lane2.
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PREEMPHASIS_LANE3 Configure preemphasis of the PHY device's lane3.
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_DRIVER_CURRENT Configure driver current of the PHY.
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_DRIVER_CURRENT_LANE0 Configure driver current of the PHY device's lane0.
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_DRIVER_CURRENT_LANE1 Configure driver current of the PHY device's lane1.
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_DRIVER_CURRENT_LANE2 Configure driver current of the PHY device's lane2.
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_DRIVER_CURRENT_LANE3 Configure driver current of the PHY device's lane3.
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PRE_DRIVER_CURRENT Configure pre-driver current of the PHY.
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PRE_DRIVER_CURRENT_LANE0 Configure pre-driver current of the PHY device's lane0.
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PRE_DRIVER_CURRENT_LANE1 Configure pre-driver current of the PHY device's lane1.
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PRE_DRIVER_CURRENT_LANE2 Configure pre-driver current of the PHY device's lane2.
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PRE_DRIVER_CURRENT_LANE3 Configure pre-driver current of the PHY device's lane3.
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_INTERFACE Select the active logical interface in the multiplex PHY device.
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_MACSEC_SWITCH_FIXED Switch MAC policy to determine speed, duplex and Pause settings
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_MACSEC_SWITCH_FIXED_SPEED Switch MAC Speed setting for Switch fixed policy
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_MACSEC_SWITCH_FIXED_DUPLEX Switch MAC Duplex setting for Switch fixed policy
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_MACSEC_SWITCH_FIXED_PAUSE Switch MAC Pause setting for Switch fixed policy
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_MACSEC_PAUSE_RX_FORWARD RX Pause settings for MACSec PHY
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_MACSEC_PAUSE_TX_FORWARD TX Pause settings for MACSec PHY
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_MACSEC_LINE_IPG Line MAC IPG setting in MACSec PHY
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_MACSEC_SWITCH_IPG Switch MAC IPG setting in MACSec PHY
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_LONGREACH_SPEED Forced speed setting in the LONGREACH mode
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_LONGREACH_PAIRS Forced number of pairs in the LONGREACH mode
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_LONGREACH_GAIN Forced gain in the LONGREACH mode
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_LONGREACH_AUTONEG LDS auto-negotiation in the LONGREACH mode
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_LONGREACH_LOCAL_ABILITY Local LDS advertisement
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_LONGREACH_REMOTE_ABILITY Remote LDS advertisement (Read Only)
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_LONGREACH_CURRENT_ABILITY Mode selected by LDS (Read Only)
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_LONGREACH_MASTER Master phy in the absence of LDS (0=slave, 1=master else undefined)
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_LONGREACH_ACTIVE Longreach mode is active (Read Only)
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_LONGREACH_ENABLE Longreach capability is enabled
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_POWER Switch between low power mode and full power mode
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_LOOPBACK_EXTERNAL Enable / Disable loopback mode with an external RJ-45 plug (at 1G)
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_LINKDOWN_TRANSMIT Enable / Disable port and MAC for transmit during link down
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_CLOCK_ENABLE Enable / Disable RX clock extraction from the port
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_CLOCK_SECONDARY_ENABLE Enable / Disable backup RX clock extraction from the port
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_CLOCK_FREQUENCY Set / Get extracted or input clock frequency (in KHz)
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_CLOCK_MODE_AUTO Automatically disable the clock when link goes down.
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_CLOCK_AUTO_SECONDARY Automatic switch primary recovery clock to secondary source when link failure.
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_CLOCK_SOURCE Get the source of primary recovered clock at present. The returned values were defined in table BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_CLOCK_SOURCE_value
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PORT_PRIMARY Switch port corresponding to the first PHY port of the PHY chip (multi-phy chips only)
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PORT_OFFSET The offset of the switch port's PHY port from the primary PHY port (multi-phy chips only)
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_EDC_CONFIG Automatically configure EDC mode through either software or hardware
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_EDC_MODE Set/Get the EDC mode
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_SUPER_ISOLATE Turn on Super Isolate mode on PHY device
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_SOFT_RESET Issue Soft-Reset to clear all PHY registers
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_EEE Enable / Disable EEE (Native) in the PHY
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_EEE_AUTO Enable / Disable (AutogrEEEn) EEE Auto in the PHY
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_EEE_AUTO_IDLE_THRESHOLD Configure IDLE threshold limit for LPI state transitions in AutogrEEEn Mode
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_EEE_AUTO_BUFFER_LIMIT Configure Buffer size for buffering IDLE/Data in AutogrEEEn Mode
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_EEE_AUTO_FIXED_LATENCY Configure Fixed Latency or Variable Latency for AutogrEEEn Mode
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_EEE_TRANSMIT_WAKE_TIME Configure WAKE time for the PHY
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_EEE_TRANSMIT_SLEEP_TIME Configure Transmit SLEEP time for the PHY
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_EEE_RECEIVE_SLEEP_TIME Configure Receive SLEEP time for the PHY
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_EEE_TRANSMIT_QUIET_TIME Configure transmit QUIET time for the PHY
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_EEE_RECEIVE_QUIET_TIME Configure Receive QUIET time for the PHY
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_EEE_TRANSMIT_REFRESH_TIME Configure Transmit REFRESH time for the PHY
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_EEE_TRANSMIT_EVENTS Transmit side events count of IDLE to LPI transition
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_EEE_TRANSMIT_DURATION Total Duration count of Transmit side in LPI state
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_EEE_RECEIVE_EVENTS Receive side events count of IDLE to LPI transition
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_EEE_RECEIVE_DURATION Total Duration count of Receive side in LPI state
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_EEE_STATISTICS_CLEAR Clear EEE statistics
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PON_LASER_TX_POWER_TIME Laser Transmit power shut down duration
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PON_LASER_TX_POWER_MODE Laser Transmit power mode (value 0: active PON, value 1: standby PON, value 2: both)
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PON_LASER_TX_STATUS Laser Transmit status (value 0: normal state, value 1: always on, value 2: disable)
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PON_LASER_RX_STATE Laser Receive status (value 0: optical los, value 1: optical unlock, value 2: optical lock)
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PON_LASER_TRANCEIVER_TEMP Transceiver temperature
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PON_LASER_SUPPLY_VOLTAGE Transceiver supply voltage
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PON_LASER_TX_BIAS Transceiver Transmit supply voltage
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PON_LASER_TX_POWER Transceiver Transmit power
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PON_LASER_RX_POWER Transceiver Receive power
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PON_RX_POWER_HIGH_ALARM_STATE Transceiver Receive power high alarm state
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PON_RX_POWER_HIGH_ALARM_REPORT_THRESHOLD Transceiver Receive power high alarm report threshold
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PON_RX_POWER_HIGH_ALARM_CLEAR_THRESHOLD Transceiver Receive power high alarm clear threshold
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PON_RX_POWER_LOW_ALARM_STATE Transceiver Receive power low alarm state
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PON_RX_POWER_LOW_ALARM_REPORT_THRESHOLD Transceiver Receive power low alarm report threshold
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PON_RX_POWER_LOW_ALARM_CLEAR_THRESHOLD Transceiver Receive power low alarm clear threshold
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PON_TX_POWER_HIGH_ALARM_STATE Transceiver Transmit power high alarm state
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PON_TX_POWER_HIGH_ALARM_REPORT_THRESHOLD Transceiver Transmit power high alarm report threshold
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PON_TX_POWER_HIGH_ALARM_CLEAR_THRESHOLD Transceiver Transmit power high alarm clear threshold
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PON_TX_POWER_LOW_ALARM_STATE Transceiver Transmit power low alarm state
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PON_TX_POWER_LOW_ALARM_REPORT_THRESHOLD Transceiver Transmit power low alarm report threshold
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PON_TX_POWER_LOW_ALARM_CLEAR_THRESHOLD Transceiver Transmit power low alarm clear threshold
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PON_TX_BIAS_HIGH_ALARM_STATE Transceiver Transmit bias high alarm state
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PON_TX_BIAS_HIGH_ALARM_REPORT_THRESHOLD Transceiver Transmit bias high alarm report threshold
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PON_TX_BIAS_HIGH_ALARM_CLEAR_THRESHOLD Transceiver Transmit bias high alarm clear threshold
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PON_TX_BIAS_LOW_ALARM_STATE Transceiver Transmit bias low alarm state
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PON_TX_BIAS_LOW_ALARM_REPORT_THRESHOLD Transceiver Transmit bias low alarm report threshold
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PON_TX_BIAS_LOW_ALARM_CLEAR_THRESHOLD Transceiver Transmit bias low alarm clear threshold
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PON_VCC_HIGH_ALARM_STATE Transceiver supply voltage high alarm state
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PON_VCC_HIGH_ALARM_REPORT_THRESHOLD Transceiver supply voltage high alarm report threshold
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PON_VCC_HIGH_ALARM_CLEAR_THRESHOLD Transceiver supply voltage high alarm clear threshold
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PON_VCC_LOW_ALARM_STATE Transceiver supply voltage low alarm state
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PON_VCC_LOW_ALARM_REPORT_THRESHOLD Transceiver supply voltage low alarm report threshold
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PON_VCC_LOW_ALARM_CLEAR_THRESHOLD Transceiver supply voltage low alarm clear threshold
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PON_TEMP_HIGH_ALARM_STATE Transceiver temperature high alarm state
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PON_TEMP_HIGH_ALARM_REPORT_THRESHOLD Transceiver temperature high alarm report threshold
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PON_TEMP_HIGH_ALARM_CLEAR_THRESHOLD Transceiver temperature high alarm clear threshold
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PON_TEMP_LOW_ALARM_STATE Transceiver temperature low alarm state
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PON_TEMP_LOW_ALARM_REPORT_THRESHOLD Transceiver temperature low alarm report threshold
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PON_TEMP_LOW_ALARM_CLEAR_THRESHOLD Transceiver temperature low alarm clear threshold
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PON_RX_POWER_HIGH_WARNING_STATE Transceiver Receive power high warning alarm state
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PON_RX_POWER_HIGH_WARNING_REPORT_THRESHOLD Transceiver Receive power high warning alarm report threshold
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PON_RX_POWER_HIGH_WARNING_CLEAR_THRESHOLD Transceiver Receive power high warning alarm clear threshold
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PON_RX_POWER_LOW_WARNING_STATE Transceiver Receive power low warning alarm state
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PON_RX_POWER_LOW_WARNING_REPORT_THRESHOLD Transceiver Receive power low warning alarm report threshold
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PON_RX_POWER_LOW_WARNING_CLEAR_THRESHOLD Transceiver Receive power low warning alarm clear threshold
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PON_TX_POWER_HIGH_WARNING_STATE Transceiver Transmit power high warning alarm state
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PON_TX_POWER_HIGH_WARNING_REPORT_THRESHOLD Transceiver Transmit power high warning alarm report threshold
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PON_TX_POWER_HIGH_WARNING_CLEAR_THRESHOLD Transceiver Transmit power high warning alarm clear threshold
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PON_TX_POWER_LOW_WARNING_STATE Transceiver Transmit power low warning alarm state
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PON_TX_POWER_LOW_WARNING_REPORT_THRESHOLD Transceiver Transmit power low warning alarm report threshold
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PON_TX_POWER_LOW_WARNING_CLEAR_THRESHOLD Transceiver Transmit power low warning alarm clear threshold
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PON_TX_BIAS_HIGH_WARNING_STATE Transceiver Transmit bias high warning alarm state
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PON_TX_BIAS_HIGH_WARNING_REPORT_THRESHOLD Transceiver Transmit bias high warning alarm report threshold
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PON_TX_BIAS_HIGH_WARNING_CLEAR_THRESHOLD Transceiver Transmit bias high warning alarm clear threshold
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PON_TX_BIAS_LOW_WARNING_STATE Transceiver Transmit bias low warning alarm state
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PON_TX_BIAS_LOW_WARNING_REPORT_THRESHOLD Transceiver Transmit bias low warning alarm report threshold
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PON_TX_BIAS_LOW_WARNING_CLEAR_THRESHOLD Transceiver Transmit bias low warning alarm clear threshold
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PON_VCC_HIGH_WARNING_STATE Transceiver supply voltage high warning alarm state
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PON_VCC_HIGH_WARNING_REPORT_THRESHOLD Transceiver supply voltage high warning alarm report threshold
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PON_VCC_HIGH_WARNING_CLEAR_THRESHOLD Transceiver supply voltage high warning alarm clear threshold
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PON_VCC_LOW_WARNING_STATE Transceiver supply voltage low warning alarm state
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PON_VCC_LOW_WARNING_REPORT_THRESHOLD Transceiver supply voltage low warning alarm report threshold
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PON_VCC_LOW_WARNING_CLEAR_THRESHOLD Transceiver supply voltage low warning alarm clear threshold
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PON_TEMP_HIGH_WARNING_STATE Transceiver temperature high warning alarm state
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PON_TEMP_HIGH_WARNING_REPORT_THRESHOLD Transceiver temperature high warning alarm report threshold
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PON_TEMP_HIGH_WARNING_CLEAR_THRESHOLD Transceiver temperature high warning alarm clear threshold
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PON_TEMP_LOW_WARNING_STATE Transceiver temperature low warning alarm state
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PON_TEMP_LOW_WARNING_REPORT_THRESHOLD Transceiver temperature low warning alarm report threshold
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PON_TEMP_LOW_WARNING_CLEAR_THRESHOLD Transceiver temperature low warning alarm clear threshold
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_DLL_POWER_AUTO Enable / Disable DLL auto power down
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_TX_LANE_SQUELCH Suppress Serdes TX without link powerdown. No reset needed to restart TX.
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_RX_LANE_SQUELCH Suppress Serdes RX incoming signals without cable unplugged or plugged.
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_DRIVER_POST2_CURRENT Second post cursor TAP.
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_RX_PPM Print PPM offset tracked by RX (After 2's complement and divide by 83.89)
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_RX_POLARITY RX polarity value
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_TX_POLARITY TX polarity value
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_RX_RESET SerDes RX reset
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_TX_RESET SerDes TX reset
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_CL72 Enable/Disable Clause 72
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_CL72_STATUS Print Cl72 status
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_RX_LOW_FREQ_PEAK_FILTER Print DSC tuned Low Freq Peaking Filter
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_FIRMWARE_MODE set the SerDes microcontroller mode
BCM_PORT_PHY_FIRMWARE_DEFAULT SerDes default microcontroller mode
BCM_PORT_PHY_FIRMWARE_SFP_OPT_SR4 SerDes microcontroller mode for optical short range
BCM_PORT_PHY_FIRMWARE_SFP_DAC SerDes microcontroller mode for direct attach copper
BCM_PORT_PHY_FIRMWARE_XLAUI SerDes microcontroller mode for 40G XLAUI mode
BCM_PORT_PHY_FIRMWARE_FORCE_OSDFE SerDes microcontroller mode for force over sample DFE
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_FIRMWARE_DFE_ENABLE SerDes microcontroller mode to enable DFE
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_FIRMWARE_LP_DFE_ENABLE SerDes microcontroller mode to enable low power DFE
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_FIRMWARE_BR_DFE_ENABLE SerDes microcontroller mode to enable digital feedback equalization
BCM_PORT_PHY_FIRMWARE_FORCE_BRDFE SerDes microcontroller mode for force baud rate DFE
BCM_PORT_PHY_FIRMWARE_SW_CL72 SerDes microcontroller mode for software cl72 with AN on
BCM_PORT_PHY_FIRMWARE_CL72_WITHOUT_AN SerDes microcontroller mode for cl72 without AN
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_DFE Set SerDes microcontroller DFE mode
BCM_PORT_PHY_DFE_AUTO SerDes microcontroller FIRMWARE controls DFE adjustment
BCM_PORT_PHY_DFE_FREEZE SerDes microcontroller DFE freeze to current values
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_RX_PEAK_FILTER Print DSC tuned Peaking Filter
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_RX_VGA 6 bit RX VGA value
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_RX_TAP1 6 bit RX DFE TAP1 value
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_RX_TAP2 6 bit RX DFE TAP2 value
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_RX_TAP3 6 bit RX DFE TAP3 value
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_RX_TAP4 6 bit RX DFE TAP4 value
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_RX_TAP5 6 bit RX DFE TAP5 value
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_RX_TAP6 6 bit RX DFE TAP6 value
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_RX_PLUS1_SLICER Even and Odd P Calibration for slicer
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_RX_MINUS1_SLICER Even and Odd M Calibration for slicer
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_RX_D_SLICER Even and Odd D Calibration for slicer
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_RX_SIGNAL_DETECT Signal Detect on link.
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_RX_SEQ_DONE RX Sequencer Done (implies CDR done too)
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_SCRAMBLER Scrambler enable/disable
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_TX_PATTERN_20BIT 20 bit tx pattern
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_TX_PATTERN_256BIT 256 bit tx pattern
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_TX_PATTERN_DATA0 256 bit tx pattern word 0
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_TX_PATTERN_DATA1 256 bit tx pattern word 1
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_TX_PATTERN_DATA2 256 bit tx pattern word 2
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_TX_PATTERN_DATA3 256 bit tx pattern word 3
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_TX_PATTERN_DATA4 256 bit tx pattern word 4
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_TX_PATTERN_DATA5 256 bit tx pattern word 5
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_TX_PATTERN_DATA6 256 bit tx pattern word 6
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_TX_PATTERN_DATA7 256 bit tx pattern word 7
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PHASE_INTERP Sync TX interpolator with any RX interpolator
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_EYE_VERTICAL_UP Vertical Up for Eye margin msmt
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_EYE_VERTICAL_DOWN Vertical Down for Eye margin msmt
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_EYE_HORIZONTAL_LEFT Horizontal left for Eye margin msmt
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_EYE_HORIZONTAL_RIGHT Horizontal Right for Eye margin msmt
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_EYE_LIVE_LINK Live link eye margin msmt or link down.
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_EYE_BER Threshold Bit Error Rate for eye msmt
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_EYE_TOL Tolerance for eye msmt
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_EYE_ENABLE Enable eye margin msmt code (after setting all other EYE parameters)
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_TX_PPM_ADJUST Adjust Tx phase interpolator(PI) frequency (enables Tx PI)
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_SOFTWARE_RX_LOS Enable Software/Firmware Rx Los Feature
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_SOFTWARE_RX_LOS_LINK_WAIT_TIMER_US Configure RX_LOS_LINK_WAIT_TIMER value in us.
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_SOFTWARE_RX_LOS_RESTART_TIMER_US Configire RX_LOS_RESTART_TIMER value in us.
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_CL73_FSM_AUTO_RECOVER Enable CL73 FSM(finite state machine) auto recovery feature
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_RX_PEAK_FILTER_TEMP_COMP Enable receiver's peaking filter temperature compensation feature
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_DRIVER_SUPPLY Configure the tx driver power supply
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_DRIVER_SUPPLY_1_5V_1_0V Specify 1.5V supply, 1.0V peak-to-peak drive
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_DRIVER_SUPPLY_1_0V_700MV Specify 1.0V supply, 700MV peak-to-peak drive
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_DRIVER_SUPPLY_1_5V_700MV Specify 1.5V supply, 700MV peak-to-peak drive
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_DIGITAL_TEMP Returns the internally derived temperature (celsius degree) of the die for the digital section
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_ANALOG_TEMP Returns the internally derived temperature (celsius degree) of the die for the analog section
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_MGBASET_802P3BZ_PRIORITY Specify MGBASE-T Broadcom or IEEE 802.3bz 5GBase-T & 2.5GBase-T mode
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_AUTONEG_MODE Set autoneg mode. Different autoneg modes supported defined in table BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_AUTONEG_mode .It is required to disable autoneg before setting the autoneg mode. Autoneg can be enabled after setting the autoneg mode.
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PARALLEL_DETECTION Enable/Disable 1G Parallel detect (1-enable/0-disable)
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PARALLEL_DETECTION_10G Enable/Disable 10G Parallel detect (1-enable/0-disable)
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_HG2_BCM_CODEC_ENABLE Enable/Disable hg2 codec (1-enable/0-disable)
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PRBS_RX_INVERT_DATA Invert PRBS Rx Data
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PRBS_CHECK_MODE GET/SET Prbs mode 0 - self-sync mode w/ hysteresis, counts bit errors 1 - self-sync mode w/ hysteresis, counts error events 2 - initial seed mode w/ hysteresis, counts bit errors 3 - initial seed mode w/ hysteresis, counts error events 4 - initial seed mode w/o hysteresis, counts bit errors, needs re-lock command 5 - initial seed mode w/o hysteresis, counts error events, needs re-lock command
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_MOD_AUTO_DETECT_ENABLE Enable/Disable module auto detection feature (1-enable/0-disable)
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_INTR_MASK Set/get interrupt mask for interrupts sent through external PHY interrupt pin. Each bit represents a separate interrupt source.
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_INTR_STATUS Get interrupt status for interrupts sent through external PHY interrupt pin. Each bit represents a separate interrupt source. Use set function to clear interrupt status.
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_XSW_LANE_MAP Cross-switch lane map. Bits[3:0] map Rx lane 0, bits [7:4] map Rx lane 1, etc. Default mapping is 0x76543210.
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_GPIO_CONFIG The 32-bit control value is divided into eight 4-bit configuration values. Bits [3:0] controls GPIO pin 0, bits [7:4] controls GPIO pin 1, etc The configuration value may be on of the following: BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_GPIO_CONFIG_DISABLED (0) BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_GPIO_CONFIG_OUTPUT (1) BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_GPIO_CONFIG_INPUT (2) For example, in order to configure GPIO pins 0 and 1 as output and GPIO pins 2 and 3 as input, then the following value must be supplied: 0x00002211
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_GPIO_VALUE The 32-bit control value is divided into eight 4-bit pin values. Bits [3:0] is the value of GPIO pin 0, bits [7:4] is the value of GPIO pin 1, etc. Pin value must be either 0 or 1. New pin values are only applied to pins configured as output pins. For example, in order to set output GPIO pins 0 and 1 to 0 and 1 respectively, then the following value must be supplied: 0x00000010 If input GPIO pins 2 and 3 are both 1, then the PHY control value returned by the API will be: 0x00001100
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PCS_MODE The 32-bit control value represents different PCS modes defined in table BCM_PORT_PHY_PCS_modes .
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_AUTONEG_ALLOW_PLL_CHANGE value of 1 allow PLL to change during AN, otherwise no pll change is allowed .
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_FAIL_OVER_MODE value of 1 enable fail over mode on the port, otherwise normal mode is used.
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_SHORT_CHANNEL_MODE value of 1 enable short channel mode on the port, otherwise normal mode is used.
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_SHORT_CHANNEL_MODE_STATUS prints the short channel mode status of the port
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_EYE_VAL_HZ_L Eye margin estimate on horizontal left
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_EYE_VAL_HZ_R Eye margin estimate on horizontal right
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_EYE_VAL_VT_U Eye margin estimate on vertical up
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_EYE_VAL_VT_D Eye margin estimate on vertical down
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_MEDIUM_TYPE The 32-bit control value represents different medium types. The configuration value may be on of the following: BCM_PORT_MEDIUM_NONE (0) BCM_PORT_MEDIUM_COPPER (1) BCM_PORT_MEDIUM_FIBER (2).
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_FORWARD_ERROR_CORRECTION_CL91 FEC cl91 on/off for tscf
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_UNRELIABLE_LOS Configuration of "unreliable_los" bit.
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_FIRMWARE_CL72_RESTART_TIMEOUT_ENABLE enable cl72 restart timeout on the firmware
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_FIRMWARE_AN_CL72_TX_INIT_SKIP_ON_RESTART skip the TXFIR initialization in a restart event during the AN link training
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_FIRMWARE_CL72_AUTO_POLARITY_ENABLE enable cl72 auto polarity on the firmware
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_TX_FIR_DRIVERMODE configure the TX drivermode
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_FORCED_SPEED_LINE_SIDE Set speed on line side of external PHY in case of EBE mode
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_EGRESS_FLOW_CONTROL_MODE Supported flow modes are defined in in table BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_FLOW_CONTROL_MODE_value
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_INGRESS_FLOW_CONTROL_MODE Supported flow modes are defined in in table BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_FLOW_CONTROL_MODE_value
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_PSM_COS_BMP Set COS bit map for PSM (Packet Storage Modude) of an external PHY in EBE/EtherRAM mode. Valid range of values are 0x1:0x1FF
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_AUTONEG_LINE_SIDE Valid in case of EBE mode of MT2 PHY device and can be applied only to enable Autoneg only on line side of MT2 ports. For all other cases, the function will return "BCM_E_UNAVAIL" to indicate the functionality unavailable.
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_FEC_CORRECTED_BLOCK_COUNT Get CL74 FEC corrected block count
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_FEC_UNCORRECTED_BLOCK_COUNT Get CL74 FEC uncorrected block count
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_FEC_CORRECTED_CODEWORD_COUNT Get RS FEC corrected codeword count
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_FEC_UNCORRECTED_CODEWORD_COUNT Get RS FEC uncorrected codeword count
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_TX_PAM4_PRECODER_ENABLE set(get) PAM4 mode tx precoder enable
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_LP_TX_PRECODER_ENABLE set(get) PAM4 mode link partner tx precoder enable
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_FAST_BER_PROJ get port bit error rate projection based on prbs data
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_LINK_TRAINING_INIT_TX_FIR_POST set the tx fir post initial value for link training

bcm_port_phy_clock_source_t
Value Description
bcmPortPhyClockSourcePrimary Recovery clock is being derived from primary port's recovered clock
bcmPortPhyClockSourceSecondary Recovery clock is being derived from the secondary port's recovered clock

RX_LOS Values
Value Meaning
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_RX_LOS_NONE Specify to Disable Software/Firmware Rx Los Feature
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_RX_LOS_SOFTWARE Specify to Enable Software Rx Los Feature
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_RX_LOS_FIRMWARE Specify to Enable Firmware Rx Los Feature

Flow Control Modes
Value Meaning
bcmPortPhyControlFlowCtrlModeNone Relay Mode or No flow control mode enabled
bcmPortPhyControlFlowCtrlLegacyPauseEn Lagacy Pause flow control mode
bcmPortPhyControlFlowCtrlPfcPause PFC flow control mode
bcmPortPhyControlFlowCtrlLlfc LLFC flow control mode

GPIO_CONFIG Values
Value Meaning
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_GPIO_CONFIG_DISABLED To disable GPIO pin
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_GPIO_CONFIG_OUTPUT To configure GPIO pin as output
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_GPIO_CONFIG_INPUT To configure GPIO pin as input

Longreach Ability Bitmap Values
Flag Meaning
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_LONGREACH_ABILITY_NONE No ability
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_LONGREACH_ABILITY_10M_1PAIR 10 Mbps over 1 pair
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_LONGREACH_ABILITY_10M_2PAIR 10 Mbps over 2 pairs
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_LONGREACH_ABILITY_20M_1PAIR 20 Mbps over 1 pair
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_LONGREACH_ABILITY_20M_2PAIR 20 Mbps over 2 pairs
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_LONGREACH_ABILITY_25M_1PAIR 25 Mbps over 1 pair
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_LONGREACH_ABILITY_25M_2PAIR 25 Mbps over 2 pairs
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_LONGREACH_ABILITY_33M_1PAIR 33 Mbps over 1 pair
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_LONGREACH_ABILITY_33M_2PAIR 33 Mbps over 2 pairs
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_LONGREACH_ABILITY_50M_1PAIR 50 Mbps over 1 pair
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_LONGREACH_ABILITY_50M_2PAIR 50 Mbps over 2 pairs
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_LONGREACH_ABILITY_100M_1PAIR 100 Mbps over 1 pair
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_LONGREACH_ABILITY_100M_2PAIR 100 Mbps over 2 pairs
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_LONGREACH_ABILITY_100M_4PAIR 100 Mbps over 4 pairs
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_LONGREACH_ABILITY_PAUSE_RX RX Pause
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_LONGREACH_ABILITY_PAUSE_TX TX Pause

Power Control Values
Flag Meaning
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_POWER_FULL full power mode
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_POWER_LOW low power mode
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_POWER_AUTO Enable auto power down mode
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_POWER_AUTO_DISABLE Disable auto power down mode
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_POWER_AUTO_FULL Enable auto power down mode with high power setting
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_POWER_AUTO_LOW Enable auto power down mode with low power setting

EDC Config Values
Value Meaning
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_EDC_CONFIG_NONE No EDC auto configuration by hardware
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_EDC_CONFIG_HARDWARE EDC auto configuration by hardware
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_EDC_CONFIG_SOFTWARE EDC auto configuration by software

Autoneg modes
Flag Meaning
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_AUTONEG_MODE_CL37 Clause 37 autoneg mode
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_AUTONEG_MODE_CL37_BAM Clause 37 BAM autoneg mode
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_AUTONEG_MODE_CL73 Clause 73 autoneg mode
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_AUTONEG_MODE_CL73_BAM Clause 73 BAM autoneg mode
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_AUTONEG_MODE_CL37_CL73 Clause 37 & Clause 73 autoneg mode
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_AUTONEG_MODE_CL37_CL73_BAM Clause 37 & Clause 73 BAM autoneg mode
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_AUTONEG_MODE_CL37_BAM_CL73 Clause 37 BAM & Clause 73 autoneg mode
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_AUTONEG_MODE_CL37_BAM_CL73_BAM Clause 37 BAM & Clause 73 BAM autoneg mode
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_AUTONEG_FEC_OVERRIDE Clause 73 autoneg mode for 100G noFEC

TX drivermode
Value Meaning
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_TX_FIR_DRIVERMODE_DEFAULT default drivermode
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_TX_FIR_DRIVERMODE_NOT_SUPPORTED not supported drivermode
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_TX_FIR_DRIVERMODE_HALF_AMP half amp mode
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_TX_FIR_DRIVERMODE_HALF_AMP_HI_IMPED high impedance half amp mode

HG2 codec mode
Value Meaning
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_HG2_BCM_CODEC_ENABLE_OFF hg2 codec off
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_HG2_BCM_CODEC_ENABLE_ON_WITH_8BYTE_IPG 8-byte IPG setting
BCM_PORT_PHY_CONTROL_HG2_BCM_CODEC_ENABLE_ON_WITH_9BYTE_IPG 9-byte IPG setting
Parameters
[in]unitUnit number.
[in]portDevice or logical port number
[in]typeType of configuration to update
[in]value(for "_set") Value of the configuration
(for "_get", OUT) Value of the configuration

◆ bcm_port_phy_drv_name_get()

int bcm_port_phy_drv_name_get ( int  unit,
bcm_port_t  port,
char *  name,
int  len 
)

Gets the physical driver name.

Gets the PHY driver name.

Parameters
[in]unitUnit number.
[in]portDevice port number
[in]nameStarting address of memory where the driver name will be written.
[in]lenLength of the provided memory in bytes.

◆ bcm_port_phy_fec_error_inject_get()

int bcm_port_phy_fec_error_inject_get ( int  unit,
bcm_port_t  port,
uint16 *  error_control_map,
bcm_port_phy_fec_error_mask_t *  bit_error_mask 
)

Parameters
[in]unitUnit number.
[in]port
[out]error_control_map
[out]bit_error_mask

◆ bcm_port_phy_fec_error_inject_set()

int bcm_port_phy_fec_error_inject_set ( int  unit,
bcm_port_t  port,
uint16  error_control_map,
bcm_port_phy_fec_error_mask_t  bit_error_mask 
)
